GV06avpari_u:49: (AVParis_1,6.4) [ye tatra jātāḥ] sarāṃsi śuṣyanty apayanti nadyaḥ prajā vyathante paśavo mṛgāś ca //

GV06avpari_u:210: (AVParis_1,26.1) yāni nakṣatrāṇi divy antarikṣe apsu bhūmau yāni nageṣu dikṣu /
GV06avpari_u:211: prakalpayaṃś candramā yāny eti sarvāṇi mamaitāni śivāni santu //
GV06avpari_u:212: (AVParis_1,26.2) aṣṭāviṃśāni śivāni śagmāni saha yogaṃ bhajantu me /
GV06avpari_u:213: yogaṃ prapadye kṣemaṃ ca kṣemaṃ prapadye yogaṃ ca namo 'horātrābhyām astu //
GV06avpari_u:214: (AVParis_1,26.3) svastitaṃ me suprātaḥ susāyaṃ sudivaṃ sumṛgaṃ suśakunaṃ me astu /
GV06avpari_u:215: suhavam agne svasty amartyaṃ gatvā punar āyābhinandan //
GV06avpari_u:217: sarvair me riktakumbhān parā tānt savitaḥ suva //
GV06avpari_u:219: śivā te pāta nāsikāṃ puṇyagaś cābhimehatām //
GV06avpari_u:220: (AVParis_1,26.6) imā yā brahmaṇaspate viṣūcīr vāta īrate /
GV06avpari_u:221: sadhrīcīr indra tāḥ kṛtvā mahyaṃ śivatamās kṛdhi //
GV06avpari_u:222: (AVParis_1,26.7) svasti no astv abhayaṃ no astu namo 'horātrābhyām astu //

GV06avpari_u:224: (AVParis_1,27.2) ārṣabhena māṃsena rohiṇyāṃ mṛgamāṃsair mṛgaśirasi rudhiram ārdrāyāṃ gṛhapatibhaktaṃ punarvasvoḥ ghṛtapāyasaṃ puṣye sarpir māṃsair aśleṣāsu

GV06avpari_u:230_0: (AVParis_1,28.4) sa yatraiva dakṣiṇāṃ diśam abhyutthitaḥ śayanahastena vāstaraṇahastena

GV06avpari_u:239: (AVParis_1,31.1) atha rājño 'bhiprayāṇasyānayanti pradakṣiṇamukhaṃ śvetam ajaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śuklavāsasam //
GV06avpari_u:241: sa cen nadati saṃsṛṣṭas tām āhuḥ siddhim uttamām //
GV06avpari_u:242: (AVParis_1,31.3) gajaṃ dhvajaṃ rathaṃ chattraṃ varma yodhān alaṃkṛtān /
GV06avpari_u:243: bhūṣaṇāni ca sarvāṇi praśastāny āyudhāni ca //
GV06avpari_u:244: (AVParis_1,31.4) vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi patākā vividhās tathā /

GV06avpari_u:259: ete dvijāḥ prādakṣiṇyāś cāṣaś cātra pradṛśyate //
GV06avpari_u:261: (AVParis_1,32.5) tiryag nyag vādhipatitaṃ viparītaṃ hīnāṅgāṅgātiriktaṃ vikṛtanagnamuṇḍabaṇḍaś citraśyāmaśyāvadantakunakhijaṭila[[ḥ]] kāṣāyāvikayoś [carmā]brāhmaṇayor

GV06avpari_u:284: (AVParis_1,33.11) kṛttikāśleṣā maghā uttare phālgunyau citrā viśākhe aśvayujau ca saptasv eteṣu daśarātram //
GV06avpari_u:288: (AVParis_1,34.3) citraś ca kṛkavākuś ca śuklaḥ kambūkapiṇḍakaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:290: (AVParis_1,34.4) paśu ghṛtaṃ kaśīkā ca ārdramāṃsāni pāyasau /
GV06avpari_u:293: anudvāraṃ ca nakṣatraṃ daivataṃ cātra yojayet //
GV06avpari_u:294: (AVParis_1,34.6) dīpāś ca maṇḍale dīptāḥ śuciś cāpi baliṃ haret /
GV06avpari_u:295: yo 'smin yas tvā mātur iti vipariharet //

GV06avpari_u:302: (AVParis_1,36.1) senāṃ ced abhyutthitāṃ mandraḥ pratigarjed rājā vāmātyo vā mariṣyatīti vidyāt tatra vāruṇīṃ japet /
GV06avpari_u:304: (AVParis_1,36.2) senāṃ ced adbhyutthitāṃ dhūmo 'nugacched vijeṣyatīti vidyāt /
GV06avpari_u:306: (AVParis_1,36.3) senāṃ ced abhyutthitāṃ vāto 'nuvāyād vijeṣyatīti vidyād vāta ā vatv ity anumantrayet //
GV06avpari_u:307: (AVParis_1,36.4) senāṃ ced abhyutthitāṃ mṛgo vyabhimṛśed arthaṃ tasyā vinaśyatīti vidyāt /

GV06avpari_u:311: (AVParis_1,36.6) senāṃ ced abhyutthitāṃ kapiñjalaḥ prativaded bhadraṃ vadeti tisraḥ kāpiñjalāni stavanāni vadanti //
GV06avpari_u:312: (AVParis_1,36.7) yo abhy u babhruṇāyasi svapantam atsi puruṣaṃ śayānam agasvalam /
GV06avpari_u:313: ayasmayena brahmaṇāśmamayena varmaṇā pary asmān varuṇo dadhad //
GV06avpari_u:316: (AVParis_1,37.1) agnir devo yajvanaḥ kṛṣṇavartmā vaiśvānaro jātavedā rasāgrabhuk /
GV06avpari_u:317: sa nakṣatrāṇāṃ prathamena pāvakaḥ kṛttikābhir jvalano no 'nuśāmyatām //
GV06avpari_u:318: (AVParis_1,37.2) prajāpatir yaḥ sasṛje prajā imā devānt sa sṛṣṭvā viniyoj[[y]]a karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:319: sa sarvabhuk sarvayogeṣu rohiṇī śivāḥ kriyāḥ kṛṇutāṃ karmasiddhaye //
GV06avpari_u:320: (AVParis_1,37.3) vidyāvido ye abhiśocamānavā arcanti śakraṃ saha devatāgaṇaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:321: sa no yoge mṛgaśiraḥ śivāḥ kriyāḥ śreṣṭharājaḥ kṛṇutāṃ karmasiddhaye //
GV06avpari_u:322: (AVParis_1,37.4) devaṃ bhavaṃ paśupatiṃ haraṃ kṛśaṃ mahādevaṃ śarvam ugraṃ śikhaṇḍinam /
GV06avpari_u:323: sahasrākṣam aśaniṃ yaṃ gṛṇanti sa no rudraḥ paripātu na ārdrayā //
GV06avpari_u:324: (AVParis_1,37.5) ....yā vipraiḥ kavibhir namasyate dākṣāyaṇī devapurādibhir nṛbhir /
GV06avpari_u:325: sā naḥ stutā prathamajā punarvasuḥ śivāḥ kriyāḥ kṛṇutāṃ karmasiddhaye //
GV06avpari_u:326: (AVParis_1,38.1) yasya devā brahmacaryeṇa karmaṇā mahāsuraṃ tigmatayābhicakrire /
GV06avpari_u:327: taṃ subudhaṃ devaguruṃ bṛhaspatim arcāmi pusyeṇa sahābhipātu mā //
GV06avpari_u:328: (AVParis_1,38.2) yā na[[ḥ]] stutaḥ parihiṇomi medhayā tapyamānam ṛṣibhiḥ kāmaśocibhiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:329: jaratkārasūnor ṛṣibhir manīṣibhis tā aśleṣā abhirakṣantu noragaiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:330: (AVParis_1,38.3) ye devatvaṃ puṇyakṛto 'bhicakrire ye cāpare ye ca pare maharṣayaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:331: arcāmi sūnur yamarājagān pitṝṃś chivāḥ kriyāḥ kṛṇutāṃ ca no maghā //
GV06avpari_u:332: (AVParis_1,38.4) yo yojayan karmaṇā carṣaṇīdhṛto bhūmiṃ ceti bhaga[[ḥ prajāḥ]] prasādayan /
GV06avpari_u:333: taddevatye śivatamām alaṃkṛte phalgunyor īḍe bhajanaṃ ca pūrvayoḥ //
GV06avpari_u:334: (AVParis_1,38.5) stutaṃ pūrvair aryamaṇaṃ manīṣibhiḥ staumi devaṃ jagati vācam erayan /
GV06avpari_u:335: taddevatye śivatamām alaṃkṛte phalgunyau na uttare devatātaye //
GV06avpari_u:336: (AVParis_1,39.1) ś[y]āvair yuktaḥ śitipād dhiraṇyayo yasya rathaḥ pathibhir vartate sukhaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:337: sa no hastena savitā hiraṇyabhug ghiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā [no] 'bhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:338: (AVParis_1,39.2) tvaṣṭre namaḥ kṣitisṛje manīṣiṇe bhūtagoptre paramakarmakāriṇe /
GV06avpari_u:339: sā na[[ḥ]] stutā kṛṇutāṃ karmasiddhaye citrāṃ devī saha yogena rūpabhṛt //
GV06avpari_u:340: (AVParis_1,39.3) yaḥ prāṇināṃ jīvayan khāni sevate śivo bhūtvā mātariśvā rasāgrabhuk /
GV06avpari_u:341: dhvajo 'ntarikṣasya sa sarvabhūtabhṛd vāyur devaḥ svātinā no 'bhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:342: (AVParis_1,39.4) yāv īḍitāv ātmavidbhir maṇīṣibhiḥ sahitau [yau] trīṇi savanāni sāmagau /
GV06avpari_u:343: indrāgnī varadau namaskṛtau viśākhayoḥ kurvatām āyuṣe śrīḥ //
GV06avpari_u:344: (AVParis_1,39.5) viśve devā yam ṛṣim āhur mitraṃ bharadvājam ṛṣitaḥ prasāmavit /
GV06avpari_u:345: taṃ jagatyā gāthayā staumy ugraiḥ sa mām anūrādhābhir [bhṛtakaṇvo] 'bhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:346: (AVParis_1,40.1) śatakratur yo nijaghāna śambaraṃ vṛtraṃ ca hatvā saritaḥ prasarjata[ḥ] /
GV06avpari_u:347: sa naḥ stutaḥ prītamanāḥ puraṃdaro marutsakhā jyeṣṭhayā no 'bhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:348: (AVParis_1,40.2) yā dhārayaty ojasātidevapadaṃ mātā pṛthivī ca sā sarvabhūtabhṛt /
GV06avpari_u:349: sā na[[ḥ]] stutā kṛṇutāṃ karmasiddhaye mūlaṃ devī nirṛtiḥ sarvakarmasu //
GV06avpari_u:350: (AVParis_1,40.3) parjanyasṛṣṭās tisṛṇībhir āvṛtaṃ yās tarpayanty abhitaḥ pravṛddhaye /
GV06avpari_u:351: tā[[ḥ]] staumy āpo vāruṇīḥ ... pūrvā āṣāḍhā svadhayāstu yojane //
GV06avpari_u:352: (AVParis_1,40.4) yās triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca madanti devā devanāmno nirmitā[[ṃ]]ś ca bhūyasaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:353: tā no 'ṣāḍhā uttarā vaso viśve [[śivāḥ]] kriyāḥ kṛṇutāṃ suramatāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:354: (AVParis_1,40.5) yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvakṛt sarvabhūtabhṛd yasmād anyan na paraṃ kiṃ canāsti /
GV06avpari_u:355: anirmitaḥ satyajitaḥ puruṣṭutaḥ sa no brahmābhijitā no 'bhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:356: (AVParis_1,41.1) sthānācyute sthānam indrāya pātave devebhyaś ca ya īrayaṃs [trir] vicakrame /
GV06avpari_u:357: taṃ svid dhi svargaṃ nākapṛṣṭhaṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇur devaḥ śravaṇenābhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:358: (AVParis_1,41.2) aṣṭau śatāni śvetaketūnāṃ yāni tvaṃ ca sa tvaṃ nijaghāna bhūyasaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:359: anādeśenobhaya[ta]ś ca vīḍitāḥ śraviṣṭhābhir no 'bhirakṣantu vājinaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:360: (AVParis_1,41.3) vājā devī devamṛṇānikākubhāv ubhāv ājasya natakarmaṇā śivā /
GV06avpari_u:361: tava vrājaṃ staumasi devabhojanau pratyagbhiṣak śatabhiṣak śivau naḥ //
GV06avpari_u:362: (AVParis_1,41.4) śunāsīrau naḥ pramumūtu jihmasau tautau pitṛbhyo dadatu[[ḥ]] stanau śubhau /
GV06avpari_u:363: tau pūrvajau kṛṇutām ekapād ajaḥ pratiṣṭhānau sarvakāmābhayāya ca //
GV06avpari_u:365: so 'hir budhnyaḥ kṛṇutām uttarau śivau pratiṣṭhānau sarvakāmābhayāya ca //
GV06avpari_u:366: (AVParis_1,41.6) yaṃ mahāhemam ṛṣitaḥ prasāmavid bharadvājaś candramasau divākaram /
GV06avpari_u:367: sajuṣṭānām aśvayujau bhayāya ca sa naḥ pūṣā kṛṇutāṃ revatīṃ śivām //
GV06avpari_u:368: (AVParis_1,41.7) jīrṇaṃ santaṃ yau yuvānaṃ hi cakratur ṛṣiṃ dhiyā cyavanaṃ somapau kṛtau /
GV06avpari_u:369: tau naś cittibhir bhiṣajām asya satkarau .... prajām aśvinyām aśvinau śivau //
GV06avpari_u:370: (AVParis_1,41.8) yasya śyāmaśabalau rakṣataḥ svadhā duṣkṛt sukṛd vividhā carṣaṇīdhṛtau /
GV06avpari_u:371: tau savitryā ca savitur dharmacāribhir yamo rājā bharaṇībhir no 'bhirakṣatu //
GV06avpari_u:375: yajed grahān haviṣyeṇa yathoktena ca devatāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:379: apāṃ stotraiḥ pavitraiś ca nakṣatrastutibhis tathā //
GV06avpari_u:384: (AVParis_1,42.7) eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ sadasyebhyaś ca dakṣiṇā /
GV06avpari_u:385: pūrvam āpyāyayed dehaṃ paścād dadyāt tu dakṣiṇām //
GV06avpari_u:386: (AVParis_1,42.8) anena vidhinā snātvā dadyāc caivātra dakṣiṇām /
GV06avpari_u:387: prāpnoty anunayaṃ puṃsaḥ sa vedaphalam aśnute //
GV06avpari_u:389: (AVParis_1,42.9) ātmānaṃ nirmalīkṛtya devān iṣṭvā grahāṃs tathā /
GV06avpari_u:390: vidvadbhyo dakṣiṇā deyā dvijān annena tarpayet //
GV06avpari_u:394: akṣatān antaraṃ kṛtvā tathā saubhāgyam arhati //
GV06avpari_u:395: (AVParis_1,43.3) yadā mṛgaśiro yujyet tadā snānaṃ vidhīyate /
GV06avpari_u:398: ārdrāyāṃ vaṇijaḥ snātāḥ sulābhāṃs tu labhanti te //
GV06avpari_u:400: gopīṭhe snāpayed go 'rthī kṣipraṃ gomān bhaviṣyati //
GV06avpari_u:403: trīn puṣyān brāhmaṇaḥ snātaḥ pārthivaṃ labhate yaśaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:406: (AVParis_1,43.8) maghābhis tu tilaiḥ snāyād utpalaiḥ kamalais tathā /
GV06avpari_u:407: tasmiṃs tu māse sā kanyā kṣipraṃ ca labhate patim //
GV06avpari_u:409: madhv eva ca tṛtīyaṃ syāt saubhāgyaṃ bhogavardhanam //
GV06avpari_u:415: yoṣārthī snāpayet tena kṣipraṃ sa labhate priyām //
GV06avpari_u:416: (AVParis_1,44.3) svātinā tu gandhaiḥ snāyād utpalaiḥ kumudais tathā /
GV06avpari_u:417: tasmiṃs tu māse sā kanyā kṣipraṃ nirvyūhyate tataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:418: (AVParis_1,44.4) khaḍgasya ca viṣāṇena gajasya ṛṣabhasya vā /
GV06avpari_u:423: rasaiś ca miśradhānyaiś cābhiṣiktaḥ prāśayed rasān //
GV06avpari_u:426: (AVParis_1,44.8) atha pūrvāsv aṣāḍhāsu yā snāyād ahate paṭe /
GV06avpari_u:428: (AVParis_1,44.9) athottarāsv aṣāḍhāsu yaḥ snāyāc ced upoṣitaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:431: abhijid brāhmaṇaḥ snātaḥ pārthivaṃ labhate yaśaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:432: (AVParis_1,45.1) śravaṇena sravantīnāṃ yaḥ snāyāt saṃgameṣu ca /
GV06avpari_u:433: sa saṃgacchati svarṇena hiraṇyena dhanena vā //
GV06avpari_u:448: (AVParis_1,46.1) sarvajñaḥ sarvaga śaṃsa nārada prajñānam anyasmād anūnaprajñāt svargasya lokasya dehādyairyāt pathibhir upapanno manuṣyaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:450: prāg astaṃgamanabhojanād yad enaṃ nityam atandritaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:458: sāsmai sarvān kāmān dugdh[v]ā eti pūrvā payasvinī //
GV06avpari_u:463: (AVParis_1,48.5) sarpān nirhanti pretasya paripanthi sukhād bhayāt /
GV06avpari_u:464: maghābhis tu tilān dadyān madhumiśrān smaran pitṝn //
GV06avpari_u:468: (AVParis_1,49.1) bṛhaddhastirathaṃ yuktaṃ hastena tu dadan naraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:469: savituḥ sthānam āpnoti divyāṃ kāmajavāṃ sabhām //
GV06avpari_u:471: gandhaiḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tu dhruve sthāne [sugandhiḥ] prapadyate //
GV06avpari_u:472: (AVParis_1,49.3) svātāv ekadhanaṃ dadyād yadyad asya priyaṃ gṛhe /
GV06avpari_u:474: (AVParis_1,49.4) dhenuṃ tu rūpasaṃpannām anaḍvāhau tu vā vahau /
GV06avpari_u:476: (AVParis_1,49.5) anūrādhāsu prāvaraṇam annaṃ tu śuci jyeṣṭhāyāṃ ca /
GV06avpari_u:477: dadyāc cānnaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo bhakṣair uccāvacaiḥ saha //
GV06avpari_u:479: mātus tenānṛṇo bhavati saṃkarāc ca vimucyate //
GV06avpari_u:485: (AVParis_1,50.2) ajaṃ saṃpacyodanaṃ dadyāt pūrvayoḥ proṣṭhapadayor aurabhreṇa sahottarayoḥ //
GV06avpari_u:486: (AVParis_1,50.3) dhenuṃ ca rūpasaṃpannāṃ gaur gṛṣṭiḥ pūrṇadohanīm /
GV06avpari_u:492: (AVParis_1,50.6) anaḍvāhaṃ tu yo dadyāt suhṛdaṃ sādhuvāhinam /
GV06avpari_u:494: (AVParis_1,50.7) [yadā vatsasya pādau dvau śiras cāpi pradṛśyate /
GV06avpari_u:495: tadā gauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvad garbhaṃ na muñcati //]
GV06avpari_u:497: tayā durgāṇi tarati kṣuradhārāṃś ca parvatān //
GV06avpari_u:498: (AVParis_1,50.9) nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathā somo jyotiṣām iva bhāskaraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:499: bhāti divyaṃ divaṃ jyotiḥ pāvakaḥ śucir uttamaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:500: (AVParis_1,50.10) evam uktāṃ nakṣatradakṣiṇāṃ yo dadātīha jīvaloke /
GV06avpari_u:502: yathā yaṣṭus tathādhyetur eṣā brāhmī pratiśrutir eṣā brāhmī pratiśrutir iti //
GV06avpari_u:504: (AVParis_1b,1.1) oṃ yad rājānaṃ śakadhūmaṃ nakṣatrāṇy akṛṇvata /
GV06avpari_u:505: bhadrāham asmai prāyacchan tato rāṣṭram ajāyata //
GV06avpari_u:506: (AVParis_1b,1.2) bhadrāham astu naḥ sāyaṃ bhadrāhaṃ prātar astu naḥ /
GV06avpari_u:507: bhadrāham asmabhyaṃ tvaṃ śakadhūma sadā kṛṇu //
GV06avpari_u:508: (AVParis_1b,1.3) yo no bhadrāham akaraḥ sāyaṃ prātar atho divā /
GV06avpari_u:509: tasmai te nakṣatrarāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:510: (AVParis_1b,1.4) yad āhuḥ śakadhūma[[ṃ]] mahānakṣatrāṇāṃ prathamajaṃ jyotir agre /
GV06avpari_u:511: tan naḥ śatīm abhikṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ niyacchāt //
GV06avpari_u:512: (AVParis_1b,1.5) yo 'smin yakṣma[[ḥ]] puruṣe praviṣṭa iṣitaṃ daivyaṃ sahaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:513: agniṣ ṭaṃ ghṛtabodhano 'paskanda no vidūram asmat so 'nyena samṛcchāt //
GV06avpari_u:515: (AVParis_1b,1.6) yas tvā mātur uta vā pituḥ parijāyamānam abhisaṃbabhūva /
GV06avpari_u:516: na tvad yam adhināsayāma so 'nyasmai sayātaiḥ praviṣṭaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:517: (AVParis_1b,1.7) aliklavā gṛdhrāḥ kaṅkāḥ suparṇāḥ śvāpadāḥ patatriṇo vayāṃsi śakunayo 'muṣyāmusyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasyādahane carantu //
GV06avpari_u:522: (AVParis_2,1.2) daivaṃ prabhavate śreṣṭhaṃ hetumātraṃ tu pauruṣam /
GV06avpari_u:523: daivena tu suguptena śakto jetuṃ vasuṃdharām //
GV06avpari_u:524: (AVParis_2,1.3) daivāt puruṣakārāc ca daivam eva viśiṣyate /
GV06avpari_u:525: tasmād daivaṃ viśeṣeṇa pūjayet tu mahīpatiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:528: (AVParis_2,1.5) apitā tu yathā bālas tathāsāṃvatsaro nṛpaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:534: prajāpatir athaiko hi na vedatrayam īkṣate //
GV06avpari_u:535: (AVParis_2,2.1) atharvabhinnaṃ yac chāntaṃ tac chāntaṃ netarais tribhiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:537: (AVParis_2,2.2) atharvā sṛjate ghoram adbhutaṃ śamayet tathā /
GV06avpari_u:538: atharvā rakṣate yajñaṃ yajñasya patir aṅgirāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:541: (AVParis_2,2.4) brahmā śamayen nādhvaryur na chandogo na bahvṛcaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:542: rakṣāṃsi rakṣati brahmā brahmā tasmād atharvavit //
GV06avpari_u:544: śāntyarthaṃ ca mahīpālo vṛṇuyād bhārgavaṃ gurum //
GV06avpari_u:548: yena vā parituṣyeta gurus tat pārthivaś caret //
GV06avpari_u:549: (AVParis_2,3.3) ghnanti daivopasargāś ca na ca devo 'bhivarṣati /
GV06avpari_u:550: vīrās tatra na sūyante yad rāṣṭram apurohitam //
GV06avpari_u:551: (AVParis_2,3.4) na haviḥ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ pitaro dvijāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:552: tasya bhūmipater yasya gṛhe nātharvavid guruḥ //
GV06avpari_u:559: (AVParis_2,4.3) bahvṛco hanti vai rāṣṭram adhvaryur nāśayet sutān /
GV06avpari_u:561: (AVParis_2,4.4) ajñānād vā pramādād vā yasya syād bahvṛco guruḥ /
GV06avpari_u:565: (AVParis_2,5.1) yathaiva paṅgur adhvānam apakṣī cāṇḍajo nabhaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:566: evaṃ chandogaguruṇā rājā vṛddhiṃ na gacchati //
GV06avpari_u:567: (AVParis_2,5.2) purodhā jalado yasya maudo vā syāt kadā cana /
GV06avpari_u:568: abdād daśabhyo māsebhyo rāṣṭrabhraṃśaṃ sa gacchati //
GV06avpari_u:571: (AVParis_2,5.4) trayo lokās trayo devās trayo vedās trayo 'gnayaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:572: ardhamātre layaṃ yānti vedaś cātharvaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:573: (AVParis_2,5.5) na tithir na ca nakṣatraṃ na graho na ca candramāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:576: vardhate dhanadhānyena rāṣṭram evaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:578: bhūmikāmo na yāceta dātāram api pārthivam //
GV06avpari_u:580: pūyate bhrūṇahāpy evaṃ cāṇḍālānnāda eva ca //
GV06avpari_u:583: (AVParis_2,6.5) yajanād abhicārād vā kva cid vā mantrakarmaṇi /
GV06avpari_u:584: pūtān eva dvijān prāhur agnikāñcanavarcasa iti //
GV06avpari_u:592: (AVParis_3,1.6) ācāryapurohitavajramukhata ity āha durmatiḥ sa bhāradvājo
GV06avpari_u:593: (AVParis_3,1.7) na hy agner ivopayuktasyopayogo vidyata iti parāśaro
GV06avpari_u:596_1: atharvavihitāni karmāṇi kuryāt sa tasya pratyaṅgiro bhūtvā hastyaśvarathapadātikaṃ
GV06avpari_u:597: (AVParis_3,1.11) variṣyan na punaḥ kuryād anyaṃ rājā purohitam /
GV06avpari_u:598: nirmālyam iva taṃ rājā nānyo bhūyaḥ samācaret //
GV06avpari_u:599: (AVParis_3,1.12) svajasraṃ hy agnau hetur bhagavato vyādhitapatitonmattābhiśastaprahīṇapradhvastasaṃprasāraṇam ṛtvik //
GV06avpari_u:600_2: abhividakaṃ jitasthānāsanaṃ himātapavarṣasahaṃ hrīdhṛtikam ārjavaṃ śamadamadayādānaśaktisaṃpannaṃ
GV06avpari_u:600_3: bṛhaspatyuśanasoḥ sthānākṛtipramāṇaṃ varṇāśrutavapuṣā cānumeyaṃ tejasvinaṃ gambhīraṃ
GV06avpari_u:601: (AVParis_3,1.14) madhuparkādyena vidhinā yathārthaṃ saṃpādya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt
GV06avpari_u:604: (AVParis_3,1.17) hastyaśvaṃ narayānaṃ divyam ābharaṇam ātapatraṃ hiraṇyaṃ kṣitigodhanadhānyaratnādikaṃ ca gurave dadyād
GV06avpari_u:607: (AVParis_3,2.1) hastyaśvaṃ gurave dadyān narayānaṃ tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:608: divyam ābharaṇaṃ caiva ātapatrādim eva ca //
GV06avpari_u:610: mantrauṣadhyo na sidhyanti rājā tatra vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:612: na ca hīnātiriktāṅgaṃ kva cit kuryāt purohitam //
GV06avpari_u:613: (AVParis_3,2.4) hīnādhikāṅgaṃ patitaṃ vivarṇaṃ stenaṃ jaḍaṃ klībam aśaktiyuktam /
GV06avpari_u:614: bhinnasvaraṃ kāṇaṃ virūpanetraṃ dveṣyaṃ ca rājā guruṃ naiva kuryāt //
GV06avpari_u:616: stene tv aśakte ca samastadoṣāḥ klībe vivarṇe nṛpatir vinaśyet //
GV06avpari_u:617: (AVParis_3,3.1) bhinnasvare jāyate gātrabhedo dveṣye gurau vipratipattim āhuḥ /
GV06avpari_u:618: vivarṇanetre patite tu putrān adhvaryuṇā ca nihanti pautrān //
GV06avpari_u:620: piṅgalaḥ pārthivaṃ hanyād rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tu kekaraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:621: (AVParis_3,3.3) bahvṛcaṃ hi niyuñjyād yaḥ paurohitye tu pārthivaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:622: sa tārapaṅke hastīva saha tenaiva majjati //
GV06avpari_u:623: (AVParis_3,3.4) adhvaryuṃ hi niyuñjyād yaḥ paurohitye tu pārthivaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:629: (AVParis_3,3.7) makheṣu rāṣṭreṣu pureṣu caiva senāsu rājñāṃ svaniveśaneṣu /
GV06avpari_u:630: ya utpātās trividhā ghorarūpās tān sarvān śamayed brahmavedavit //
GV06avpari_u:631: (AVParis_3,3.8) tasmād guruṃ vedarahasyayuktaṃ caturvidhe karmaṇi cāpramattam /
GV06avpari_u:632: śāntaṃ ca dāntaṃ ca jitendriyaṃ ca kuryān narendraḥ priyadarśanaṃ ca //
GV06avpari_u:638: (AVParis_4,1.2) atha purohitaḥ snātānuliptaḥ śuciḥ śuklavāsāḥ soṣṇīṣaḥ savitā prasavānām iti vyākhyātam //
GV06avpari_u:640: (AVParis_4,1.4) pari dhatteti dvābhyāṃ rājño vastram abhimantrya prayacchet //
GV06avpari_u:644: (AVParis_4,1.8) ehi jīvaṃ trāyamāṇam ity akṣiṇī aṅkte //
GV06avpari_u:647: (AVParis_4,1.11) yat te mātā yat te piteti narayānam //
GV06avpari_u:650: marditāḥ śatravo 'nena vaśam āyāntu te sadeti //
GV06avpari_u:651: (AVParis_4,1.14) paryaṅkam āsanaṃ khaḍgaṃ dhvajaṃ chattraṃ sacāmaram /
GV06avpari_u:652: ratham aśvagajaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhanur varma śareṣudhim //
GV06avpari_u:656: abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivīty abhimantrito brāhmaṇān praṇipatya prāk //
GV06avpari_u:661: (AVParis_4,1.21) asuraiḥ pīḍyamānas tu purā śakro jagatprabhuḥ /
GV06avpari_u:665: (AVParis_4,1.23) proktāni maṅgalāny aṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaur hutāśanaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:666: bhūmiḥ siddhārthakāḥ sarpiḥ śamī vrīhiyavau tathā //
GV06avpari_u:667: (AVParis_4,1.24) etāni satataṃ puṇyāni saṃpaśyann arcayann api /
GV06avpari_u:668: na prāpnoty āpadaṃ rājā śriyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamām //
GV06avpari_u:674: (AVParis_4,2.6) yad duḥkṛtaṃ yac chabalaṃ sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ dahatv ity
GV06avpari_u:675: (AVParis_4,2.7) anena mantreṇa suvarṇaṃ śarīre nighṛṣya dakṣiṇena hastena viprāya dadyād
GV06avpari_u:677: (AVParis_4,2.9) aparimitaguṇān tilān sauvarṇamaye tāmramaye vā pātre sthāpayitvā yad ajñānād ity abhimantrya viprāya dadyāt //
GV06avpari_u:678: (AVParis_4,2.10) yad ajñānāt tathā jñānād yan mayā śabalaṃ kṛtam /
GV06avpari_u:679: tat sarvaṃ tiladānena dahyatām iti hi prabho //
GV06avpari_u:684: (AVParis_4,2.13) annaṃ tu vividhaṃ nityaṃ pradadyāt dvijātaye /
GV06avpari_u:686: (AVParis_4,2.14) gṛhadevāṃs tu saṃpūjya kāryaś cāpy utsavo gṛhe /
GV06avpari_u:687: chattrādīni ca yānāni pūjayed vidhivat svayam //
GV06avpari_u:688: (AVParis_4,2.15) [puṣpaiś ca vividhaiḥ śubhraiḥ phalaiś cāpy arcayed budhaḥ] tasmāt sarvāṇi satataṃ dānāni tu mahīpatiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:689: dattvā śraddhānvito viprair vṛto bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:690: (AVParis_4,3.1) atha piṣṭamayīṃ rātriṃ caturbhir dīpakaiḥ saha /
GV06avpari_u:692: (AVParis_4,3.2) namas kṛtvā tato rātrim arcayitvā yathāvidhi /
GV06avpari_u:694: (AVParis_4,3.3) pāhi māṃ satataṃ devi sarāṣṭraṃ sasuhṛjjanam /
GV06avpari_u:695: uṣase naḥ prayacchasva śāntiṃ ca kṛṇu me sadā /
GV06avpari_u:696: ye tvāṃ prapadyante devi na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:698: bhadrāṃ bhagavatīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ viśvasya jagato niśām //
GV06avpari_u:700: prapanno 'haṃ śivāṃ rātriṃ bhadre pāram aśīmahi //
GV06avpari_u:701: (AVParis_4,3.6) yāṃ sadā sarvabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca /
GV06avpari_u:702: sāyaṃ prātar namasyanti sā māṃ rātry abhirakṣatv iti //
GV06avpari_u:703: (AVParis_4,4.1) ā rātri pārthivam iṣirā yoṣā trāyamāna ity rātryāṇi //
GV06avpari_u:704: (AVParis_4,4.2) mamobhā mahyam āpa iti sūktābhyām anvālabhya japet //

GV06avpari_u:1536: homaṃ kṛtvā yathoktaṃ tu nimittāny upalakṣayet //
GV06avpari_u:1540: vahniḥ siddhikaro jñeyaḥ saptarātrān na saṃśayaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1542: taṃ vidyāt siddhidaṃ vahniṃ padmavarṇanibhaṃ tathā //
GV06avpari_u:1544: yathoktaviparītas tu na vahniḥ syāt prayaṃkaraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1550: (AVParis_22,1.1) om athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi araṇyoś caiva lakṣaṇam /
GV06avpari_u:1551: rūpam athā pramāṇaṃ ca guṇadoṣān tathaiva ca //
GV06avpari_u:1553: purā kalpe ca yad dṛṣṭam ṛṣibhiś caiva lakṣaṇam //
GV06avpari_u:1556: (AVParis_22,1.4) tithau śubhāyāṃ nakṣatre diśaṃ gatvā tv aninditām /
GV06avpari_u:1557: aśvatthāt tu śamīgarbhād uktam āharaṇaṃ śruteḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1559: madhye mūlaṃ na bāhye tu sa garbhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1560: (AVParis_22,2.1) abhāve tu śamīgarbhe aśvatthād eva vāharet /
GV06avpari_u:1564: (AVParis_22,2.3) ā skandhād uraso vāpi iti staudāyanaiḥ smṛtā /
GV06avpari_u:1567: jaladāyanair vitastir vā ṣoḍaśeti tu bhārgavaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1570: (AVParis_22,3.1) tasyās tu piṇḍaḥ ṣaḍbhāge caturbhāge tu vistare /
GV06avpari_u:1573: anyaiś ca doṣaiḥ saṃyuktā varjanīyā prayatnataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1575: klinnā vināśayet putrān sphuṭitā śokam āvahet //
GV06avpari_u:1576: (AVParis_22,3.4) ūrdhvaśuṣke na kartavyā kṛṣṇe rūkṣe tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:1577: ubhe apy ekavṛkṣe ca araṇiś cottarāraṇiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1578: (AVParis_22,3.5) tatpramāṇā tadardhā vā bhūyasī vā yathecchayā /
GV06avpari_u:1579: anenaiva tu manthavyo na kuryād yonisaṃkaram //
GV06avpari_u:1581: sa yajñas tāmaso nāma phalaṃ tatra na vidyate //
GV06avpari_u:1582: (AVParis_22,4.2) piṇḍe tv ayanaviṣuvau pṛthutve ṛtavaḥ sthitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1583: ardhamāsāś ca dīrghatve kālaś cātra pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1585: tatpradhānāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yajñaś cāpi tathaiva hi //
GV06avpari_u:1587: dvitīye jānunī ūrū tṛtīye śroṇir ucyate //
GV06avpari_u:1588: (AVParis_22,4.5) caturthe jaṭharaṃ sāṅgaṃ grīvā caiva tu pañcame /
GV06avpari_u:1589: ṣaṣthe śiraḥ samākhyātam aṅgāny etāni nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:1591: jānunoś ca tathā corvo rākṣastvaṃ prayāti hi //
GV06avpari_u:1592: (AVParis_22,5.2) śroṇyāṃ ca sarvakāmā[ḥ] syur jaṭhare kṣut tathā smṛtā /
GV06avpari_u:1593: urasy amitrā grīvāyāṃ mṛtyuḥ śirasi vedanā //
GV06avpari_u:1594: (AVParis_22,5.3) śroṇyām evāta aicchanti nirdoṣā kīrtitā yataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1595: tathā vittapaśūn putrān svargam āyuḥ priyaṃ sukham //
GV06avpari_u:1596: (AVParis_22,5.4) prathamaṃ manthanaṃ śroṇyām ādhāne ca viśeṣataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1597: itarāṇi yatheṣtaṃ hi grīvāṃ sarvatra varjayet //
GV06avpari_u:1598: (AVParis_22,5.5) trīṇy aṅgulāni tyaktvādau tathā catvāri cāntataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1599: madhye devāḥ sthitās tasmād vahniṃ tatraiva manthayet //
GV06avpari_u:1600: (AVParis_22,6.1) anulomā bhaved yoniḥ pārśvabhedo na vidyate /
GV06avpari_u:1602: (AVParis_22,6.2) mūlād aṅgulam utsṛjya trīṇitrīṇi ca pārśvayoḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1603: devayonis tu vijñeyā tatra mathyo hutāśanaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1604: (AVParis_22,6.3) [mūlāt tyaktvāṅgulāny aṣṭau agrāt tu dvādaśaiva hi /
GV06avpari_u:1605: antare devayoniḥ syāt tatra mathyo hutāśanaḥ] //
GV06avpari_u:1606: (AVParis_22,6.4) vedā yajñāya saṃbhūtā yajñā agnau pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1607: araṇyor jāyate cāgnis tayos tasmāt pradhānatā //
GV06avpari_u:1609: netraṃ tu ṣaḍguṇaṃ cātrād uttaro 'ṣṭāṅgulaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1610: (AVParis_22,7.1) aṣṭāṅgulaḥ pramanthaḥ syāc cātraṃ syād dvādaśāṅgulam /
GV06avpari_u:1612: (AVParis_22,7.2) vyāmamantraṃ vadanty eke anye hastatrayaṃ viduḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1614: (AVParis_22,7.3) cātre ca bhāskarāḥ proktā uttare vasavas tathā /
GV06avpari_u:1615: netre devagaṇāḥ sarve viṣṇuś caiva tu pīḍake //
GV06avpari_u:1616: (AVParis_22,7.4) araṇir yā dvitīyā tu uttarā sā prakīrtitā /
GV06avpari_u:1617: tatraikadeśaṃ saṃgṛhya uttaraḥ sa ca kīrtitaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1619: pāṇibhyāṃ pīḍanaṃ śubhram uttarāgraṃ pragṛhya tu //
GV06avpari_u:1620: (AVParis_22,8.1) mūle mūlaṃ tu saṃyojya cātrasyaivottarasya ca /
GV06avpari_u:1622: (AVParis_22,8.2) netreṇa bhrāmayec cātraṃ yāvad vahniḥ prajāyate /
GV06avpari_u:1623: sarvair hi devaiḥ saṃpannas tena sarvasukhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1624: (AVParis_22,8.3) brahmādyair daivataiś caiva vidvadbhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1627: tanmantrena dvijāgryair vā smṛtam etad dhi manthanam //
GV06avpari_u:1628: (AVParis_22.9.1) (atha) yady araṇī jīrṇe syātāṃ jantubhir manthanena vā //
GV06avpari_u:1629: samānīte nave araṇī āhṛtya śve bhūte darśenāṣṭvā tasmin pūrve śakalīkṛtya gārhapatye prakṣipyopary agnau dhārayan japati //
GV06avpari_u:1630: (AVParis_22,9.2) ud budhyasvāgne pra viśasya yonyāṃ devayajyāyai voḍhave jātavedaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1631: araṇyor araṇī saṃ carasva jīrṇāṃ tvacam ajīrṇayā nir ṇudasvety
GV06avpari_u:1634: (AVParis_22,9.4) mano jyotir juṣatām ājyasya vichinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu /
GV06avpari_u:1635: yā iṣṭā uṣaso yā aniṣṭās tāḥ saṃ cinomi haviṣā ghṛtena svāheti agnaye 'gnimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati //
GV06avpari_u:1639: araṇyoś cāṅgasaṃbhūtaṃ netraṃ cātraṃ ca pīḍakaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1640: (AVParis_22,10.2) ya idaṃ dhārayiṣyati araṇyor iha lakṣaṇam /
GV06avpari_u:1641: na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid loke paratra ca //
GV06avpari_u:1642: (AVParis_22,10.3) putrārthī śrāvayen nityam acirāl labhate sutam /
GV06avpari_u:1647: na tasya mṛtyur na jarā nidrā vyādhir na caiva hi /
GV06avpari_u:1650: (AVParis_23,1.1) om athāto yajñapātrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yonir eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:1651: rūpaṃ tathā pramāṇaṃ ca kramenaiva prakathyate //
GV06avpari_u:1656: (AVParis_23,1.4) bilvākṛtiś caruḥ proktas tāmro vā mṛnmayo 'pi vā /
GV06avpari_u:1658: (AVParis_23,1.5) kuśasyāmrasya vā parṇair veṇor vā balbajasya vā /
GV06avpari_u:1659: catuṣkoṇārdhavītaṃ ca loke śūrpaṃ tad ucyate //
GV06avpari_u:1660: (AVParis_23,2.1) asiḥ khaḍgaṃ ca nistriṃśaḥ paryāyāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1661: tadākṛṭy eva yad rūpaṃ yajñe sphyaṃ ca vadanti tam //
GV06avpari_u:1663: madhye hīnaṃ tathordhvāgraṃ vāraṇaṃ tad ulūkhalam //
GV06avpari_u:1666: (AVParis_23,2.4) sruvas tu mūladaṇḍaś ca bilaṃ cāṅguṣṭhaparvaṇaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1668: (AVParis_23,2.5) vaikaṅkatī dhruvā proktā sarvayajñeṣu yā smṛtā /
GV06avpari_u:1673: dvyaṅgulaḥ khātā ca bilād aṅgulaṃ caiva piṇḍikā /
GV06avpari_u:1674: vṛttā vā caturaśrā vā sādhastāc chobhanā smṛtā] //
GV06avpari_u:1676: bilaṃ vṛttaṃ sruco madhye daṇḍasthaulyaṃ bilārdhataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1678: saptatriṃśad aṅgulāni sā sruk caiva prakīrtitā //
GV06avpari_u:1679: (AVParis_23,3.5) bhinnā viśīrṇā vakrā ca klinnā ca sphuṭitā tathā /
GV06avpari_u:1682: unmūlye patite bhagne manasāpi na cintayet //
GV06avpari_u:1684: sruvārthaṃ pātayed vṛkṣaṃ prātaḥ prāgraṃ ca saumyavāk //
GV06avpari_u:1686: yat tasya carma tvak caiva tat kṛṣṇājinam ucyate //
GV06avpari_u:1689: (AVParis_23,4.5) aṅguṣṭhaparvāgramukhaṃ darvyākṛti tu mekṣaṇam. vaikaṅkate pālāśe vā prādeśas tu pramāṇataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1690: (AVParis_23,5.1) alābu vaiṇavaṃ vāpi dārvyaṃ vaiṇavam eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:1691: akṣāv amaṇḍalau proktau yathā dṛṣṭaṃ pura rṣibhiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1692: (AVParis_23,5.2) cakrābhyāṃ kāṣṭhasaṃghātaiḥ śilpibhiś caiva yat kṛtam /
GV06avpari_u:1693: loke prasiddhaṃ śakaṭam agniṣṭhaṃ yājñike vidhau //
GV06avpari_u:1695: sauvīrādy añjanaṃ caiva atha vā daivikaṃ tathā //
GV06avpari_u:1696: (AVParis_23,5.4) abhyañjanaṃ ca tat praktaṃ tilatailaṃ ca yad viduḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1700: (AVParis_23,6.1) hastamātraṃ sruvaḥ khaḍgaṃ sakṛdāchinnam eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:1701: bāhumātrā juhūḥ proktā dhruvā barhis tathaiva ca //
GV06avpari_u:1702: (AVParis_23,6.2) tāmraś caiva sruvaḥ proktaḥ khaḍgaṃ khādiram eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:1703: pālāśī ca juhūḥ kāryā idhmāś caiva viśeṣataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1708: (AVParis_23,6.5) śamy aśvattha[ḥ] palāśaś ca khādiro 'tha vikaṅkataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1710: (AVParis_23,7.1) eṣām alābhe vṛkṣāṇām anye grāhyās tu yājñikaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1714: (AVParis_23,7.3) sāyaṃhomeṣu yad dravyaṃ prātarhomeṣu tad bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:1715: bhinnadravyahutaṃ yat tu na hutaṃ tasya tad bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:1717: kṣudhākāle tathāpy keke pakṣahomaṃ tu kārayet //
GV06avpari_u:1718: (AVParis_23,7.5) yāyāvarāṇāṃ munibhiḥ pakṣahomas tu taiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1719: yathā kathaṃ cid vacanaṃ śrutyuktaṃ dvija ācāret //
GV06avpari_u:1721: pakṣahomaṃ tadā kuryān nistīrya satataṃ caret //
GV06avpari_u:1723: ekā samit sakṛd dhomaḥ so 'rdhamāsāya kalpate //
GV06avpari_u:1725: evaṃ gārhapatye ca dakṣiṇāgnau ca juhvati //
GV06avpari_u:1728: (AVParis_23,8.5) ṛṣibhiś ca purā dṛṣṭam āpatkāleṣu sarvataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1731: tatprayojanamātraṃ tu na doṣaḥ sūtakeṣu ca //
GV06avpari_u:1735: eṣāṃ doṣo na vidyeta sāyamprātaḥ kriye sthite //
GV06avpari_u:1744: (AVParis_23,10.3) aṅgulāni tu ṣaṭtriṃśad dhnvākṛtyā tu kārayet /
GV06avpari_u:1745: dakṣiṇāgnes tu vai kuṇḍaṃ vidvadbhij parikathyate //
GV06avpari_u:1747: sabhyaṃ necchanti śālāgnau māhakiḥ kauśikas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:1749: mantād eva tathā proktaṃ dravyaṃ yatra na dṛśyate //
GV06avpari_u:1750: (AVParis_23,10.6) ājyaṃ tatra vijānīiyād dhomas tatra sruveṇa ca /
GV06avpari_u:1754: carutbhiś ca kriyāḥ sarvāś cāturhotraṃ tad ucyate //
GV06avpari_u:1755: (AVParis_23,11.1) yājñikās tu vadanty anye caturbhir yac ca hūyate /
GV06avpari_u:1757: (AVParis_23,11.2) durbhikṣe cākule bhaṅge ṛtvijāṃ cāpy asaṃbhave /
GV06avpari_u:1759: (AVParis_23,11.3) ṛtvijāṃ ca7apy asāmnidhye adhvaryus tat paṭhet svayam /
GV06avpari_u:1761: (AVParis_23,11.4) khāte lūne tu yac coktaṃ saṃskāraśrutihetubhiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1765: (AVParis_23,12.1) kṛṣṇājinaṃ tilā darbhā mantrā ājyaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1766: doṣo na vidyate hy eṣāṃ yathārthaṃ saṃniyojayet //
GV06avpari_u:1774: eṣām anujñām ādāya kuryād vaitānikī[ḥ] kriyāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1777: (AVParis_23,13.2) sruk sruvaś ca dhruvā khaḍgaṃ musalolūkhalaṃ caruḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1779: (AVParis_23,13.3) pātraṃ grahāś ca camasā haviḥ śūrpaṃ kuśāsanam /
GV06avpari_u:1780: somaspṛṣṭaṃ ca yad bhāṇḍaṃ vāriśaucena śudhyati //
GV06avpari_u:1782: avaśyaṃ tad dvijaiḥ kāryaṃ śreyaskāmais tu nityaśaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1783: (AVParis_23,13.5) pātrānāṃ tu prasāṅgena yad anyat parikīrtitam /
GV06avpari_u:1784: sāyaṃ prātas tu homāṅgaṃ purā dṛṣṭaṃ maharṣibhiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1791: (AVParis_23,14.4) niṣkāmo vā sakāmo vā vedoktaṃ yaḥ samācaret /
GV06avpari_u:1792: niṣkāmasya tu muktiḥ syāt sakāmaḥ phalam aśnute //
GV06avpari_u:1793: (AVParis_23,14.5) niṣkāmeṇa tu yat kiṃ cit kartavyam iti vaidikam /
GV06avpari_u:1794: tat sarvaṃ muktidaṃ jñeyaṃ parāparaparaṃ sukham //
GV06avpari_u:1795: (AVParis_23,14.6) na śokas tasya no vyādhir na mṛtyur na jarā tathā /
GV06avpari_u:1796: na kṣudhā na pipāsā ca amṛtātmā sa tiṣṭhati //
GV06avpari_u:1798: (AVParis_24,1.1) om atha rṣiputrikāyāṃ tu sphutaṃ sarveṣu karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:1806: (AVParis_24,1.5) eṣā vai viparītā ca kāryā ghoreṣu karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:1807: karmaṇām anurūpāṃ tu vediṃ vakṣyāmy ataḥ param //
GV06avpari_u:1812: (AVParis_24,1.8) dakṣiṇena tu yā vakrā yājñikaṃ sā vināśayet /
GV06avpari_u:1813: yā ca vakrottareṇa syād yajamānaṃ vināśayet //
GV06avpari_u:1814: (AVParis_24,1.9) purastāt pṛṣṭhato vāpi madhyato viṣamā ca yā /
GV06avpari_u:1815: puram antaḥpuraṃ cāpi nāyakaṃ ca hinasti sā //
GV06avpari_u:1817: viśeṣatas tu teṣv eva karmasv evābhidhāsyate //
GV06avpari_u:1820: (AVParis_24,2.2) tatas tu yatnavān samyag agnāv upasamāhite /
GV06avpari_u:1822: (AVParis_24,2.3) śabdaṃ varṇaṃ ca gandhaṃ ca rūpaṃ snehaṃ prabhāṃ gatim /
GV06avpari_u:1823: sparśaṃ cāpi parīkṣeta agnāv iti viniścayaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1832: (AVParis_24,3.3) huto 'pi saṃjvalaty eva snigdho viprasya dakṣiṇaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1840: (AVParis_24,4.2) prahasann iva śabdena dyotayann iva tejasā /
GV06avpari_u:1844: (AVParis_24,4.4) arcibhir jvālabhāraiś ca pradahan dviṣatāṃ diśaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:1845: vidhūmaḥ kuṇḍalī yaḥ syād anulomaś ca siddhaye //
GV06avpari_u:1848: (AVParis_24,5.2) viśālamūle pṛthule ca madhye jñeyānale saṃprati pīḍitāgre /
GV06avpari_u:1852: (AVParis_24,5.4) vibhrājate tv akhilarāgayuto hutāśo hastāvṛtaṃ kathayatīva jayaṃ nṛpasya /
GV06avpari_u:1855: dātā nṛpāya vasudhāṃ tu himāṃśumaulijyotsnāvikāśitasamudrajalāṃ hutāśaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1857: vaiśvānaro jvalati yasya viśuddhamūrtiḥ sa prāpnuyān nṛpaśatādhipatāṃ narendraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:1863: āyāti tasya bhavanaṃ hy alidīptimālā savrīḍasūryakiraṇā kṣitipālalakṣmīr iti //
GV06avpari_u:1865: (AVParis_25,1.1) oṃ śaunakaṃ tu sukhāsīnaṃ bhārgavaḥ paripṛcchati /
GV06avpari_u:1866: kuṇḍaṃ kasmin bhavet kīdṛk kasyāṃ vā diśi kiṃ phalam //
GV06avpari_u:1867: (AVParis_25,1.2) sa tasmā upasannāya ācaṣṭe bhārgavāya tu /
GV06avpari_u:1868: kuṇḍaṃ yasmin bhaved yādṛg yasyāṃ vā diśi yat phalam //
GV06avpari_u:1873: (AVParis_25,1.5) caturaśraṃ tu pūrvasyām aindreṣv api ca karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:1875: (AVParis_25,1.6) ardhacandraṃ tu yāmyāyāṃ yāmyeṣv api ca karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:1876: nairṛtyāṃ ca trikoṇaṃ syād abhicāravidhau śubham //
GV06avpari_u:1877: (AVParis_25,1.7) vāruṇyāṃ vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ vāruṇyeṣv api karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:1878: vāyavyāṃ pañcakoṇaṃ tu vāyavyeṣv api karman //
GV06avpari_u:1879: (AVParis_25,1.8) uttarasyāṃ tu padmābhaṃ saumyeṣv api ca karmasu /
GV06avpari_u:1880: aiśānyāṃ saptakoṇaṃ tu raudreṣv api yathoditam //

GV06avpari_u:5537: mānuṣeṣu ca saptāhaṃ tataḥ śreyas tu kalpayet //
GV06avpari_u:5539: (AVParis_51,1.1) oṃ ke cid grahā nārarān āśrayante ke cid grahā [jyotiṣi] saṃgrahe ca /
GV06avpari_u:5540: graho graheṇaiva hataḥ kathaṃ syād vijñāya tattvaṃ bhagavān bravītu //
GV06avpari_u:5541: (AVParis_51,1.2) evaṃ sa pṛṣṭo munibhir mahātmā provāca gargo grahayuddhatantram /
GV06avpari_u:5542: parājayaṃ caiva jayaṃ ca teṣāṃ śubhāsubham(aśubhamñ)
GV06avpari_u:5544: (AVParis_51,1.3) arko jātaḥ kaliṅgeṣu yavaneṣu ca candramāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5545: aṅgārakas tv avantyāyāṃ magadhāyāṃ budhas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:5548: ketur malayake jāta ity etad grahajātakam //
GV06avpari_u:5549: (AVParis_51,1.5) yasmin deśe tu yo jātaḥ sa grahaḥ pīḍyate yadā taṃ deśaṃ ghātitaṃ vidyād durbhikṣeṇa bhayena vā //
GV06avpari_u:5550: (AVParis_51,2.1) divākaraś caiva śanaiścaras tathā bṛhaspatiś caiva budhaś ca nāgarāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5551: prajāpatiḥ ketur athāpi candramās tathaiva rāhūśanasau ca yāyinaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5552: (AVParis_51,2.2) yadā graho nagara eva nāgaraṃ vijeṣyate yāyy atha vāpi yāyinam /
GV06avpari_u:5553: tadā nṛpo nāgara eva nāgaraṃ vijeṣyate vāyy atha vāpi yāyinam //
GV06avpari_u:5554: (AVParis_51,2.3) ārohaṇaṃ ca bhedaś ca lekhanaṃ savyadakṣiṇam /
GV06avpari_u:5558: (AVParis_51,2.5) sarveṣāṃ nabhasi samāgame grahāṇām uktṛṣṭo bhavati tathaiva raśmivān yaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5559: snigdhatvaṃ bhavati tu yasya [sa graho graheṇa] saṃyukto bhavati [tu yaḥ] parājayeta śeṣaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5560: (AVParis_51,3.1) śyāmo vā vyapagataraśmimaṇḍalo vā rūkṣo vā vyapagataraśmivān kṛśo vā /
GV06avpari_u:5561: ākrānto vinipatitas tato 'pasavyo vijñeyo hata iti sa graho graheṇa //
GV06avpari_u:5562: (AVParis_51,3.2) budhaś ca bhaumaḥ śanibhārgavāṅgirāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ yāti yadā niśākaram /
GV06avpari_u:5563: anamayatvaṃ triṣu saukhyam uttamaṃ viparyaye cāpi mahāñ janakṣayaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5564: (AVParis_51,3.3) dhanakanakarajatasaṃcayāś ca sarve śamadamamantraparāś caye manuṣyāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5565: śakayavanatukhārabālhikāś ca kṣayam upayānti divākarasya ghāte //
GV06avpari_u:5566: (AVParis_51,3.4) atha some hate vidyād dhrvaṃ rājño viparyayaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5570: (AVParis_51,4.1) traigartāḥ kṣitipatayaḥ sayodhamukhyāḥ pīḍyante girinilayāgnijīvinaś ca /
GV06avpari_u:5571: saṃgrāmāḥ sarudhirapāṃsuvarṣamiśrā durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dharāsutasya ghāte //
GV06avpari_u:5572: (AVParis_51,4.2) sāgaranilayāḥ paurāḥ kṣayam upayānti narā vaṇikpradhānāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5573: bhavati tu [rājā] vijayī prayāyī budhabandhane prapatanti cātra sobhyāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5574: (AVParis_51,4.3) daivajñās tapasi ciraṃ suniścitārthāḥ syur dāntā nṛpatigaṇaḥ purohitāś ca /
GV06avpari_u:5575: āgantur jayati vadhaś ca nāgarāṇāṃ trailokyam <
GV06avpari_u:5578: (AVParis_51,4.4) yo rājā prathitaparākramaḥ pṛthivyāṃ vaṅgāṅgādiṣu madadhāḥ saśūrasenāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5579: ye yodhāḥ samaraṇabhumilabdhaśabdās te sainyaiḥ kṣayam upayānti śukraghāte //
GV06avpari_u:5580: (AVParis_51,4.5) mahiṣakavṛṣabhāḥ sabhasmapauṇḍrāḥ kṛṣipaśupālyaratāś ca ye manuṣyāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5581: vividhabhayasamāhitās tu sarve kṣayam upayānti śanaiścarasya ghāte //
GV06avpari_u:5582: (AVParis_51,5.1) ye ke cin nṛpatiṣu dāmbhikāḥ piśācāḥ kāryāṇāṃ vrataniyameṣu channapāpāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5583: ye cānye śabarapulindacedigādhā bādhyante yadi bhavate 'tra rāhughātaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5584: (AVParis_51,5.2) ākrāntaṃ samanubhavanti yāyisaṃghā vadhyante yadi bhavate [paras] paro 'highātaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5585: saṃgrāmāḥ sarudhirapāṃsuvarṣamiśra durbhikṣaṃ bhavati tu ketupīḍanena //
GV06avpari_u:5586: (AVParis_51,5.3) yat kiṃ cid divigatam antarikṣajaṃ vā bhaumaṃ vā bhavati nimittam apraśastam /
GV06avpari_u:5587: tat savaṃ stanitamahābhrabidyudvarṣaiḥ śāntaṃ syād bhavati sadakṣiṇaiś ca homaiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5588: (AVParis_51,5.4) ye deśā grahagaṇabhinnabhūmikampā yeṣāṃ vā graha upayātacandrasūryaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5590: (AVParis_51,5.5) prasavyas triṣu māseṣu saṃsargo māsikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5591: lekhane pakṣa ity āhur bhedane saptarātrikam //
GV06avpari_u:5592: (AVParis_51,5.6) āgneyā vāsavāś caiva vāyavyā vāruṇās tathā /
GV06avpari_u:5593: sarva eva śubhā jñeyā gargasya vacanaṃ yathā //
GV06avpari_u:5595: (AVParis_52,1.1) om atharvāṇaṃ namaskṛtya uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5596: kīdṛśā grahaputrāś ca kiyanto vā vadasva me //
GV06avpari_u:5597: (AVParis_52,1.2) pṛṣṭaha sa śaunakenātha brāhmaṇānāṃ hitāya vai /
GV06avpari_u:5601: (AVParis_52,1.4) pṛthikcarāś ca ye tatra te ca syuḥ saṃghacāriṇaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5609: (AVParis_52,2.3) śuklā nikarāḥ saurābhās tyajanta iva cārciṣaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5610: sphuranta iva cākāśe bimbakā raśmibhir vṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5613: (AVParis_52,2.5) ye śvetāḥ kiṃcid ākṛṣṇā viśikhāḥ syur vitārakāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5614: te ṣaṣṭiḥ kanakā nāma śanaiścarasutā grahāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5618: triśikhā vā tribhāgā vā ṣaṣṭir ity uttare pathi //
GV06avpari_u:5620: śatam ekādhikaṃ mṛtyoḥ putrāḥ syur dhūmaketavaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5622: rāhoḥ putrās trayas triṃśad grahās tāmasakīlakāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5624: viśvarūpāḥ sutā agner grahā viṃśaṃ śataṃ smṛtam //
GV06avpari_u:5625: (AVParis_52,4.1) aruṇās tu sutā vāyor dāruṇāḥ saptasaptatiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5628: prājāpatyā grahās tv aṣṭau gaṇakā nāmanāmataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5634: ete nāmnā smṛtāḥ kaṅkās triṃśad dvau vāruṇā grahāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5636: kālaputrāḥ kabandhās te smṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatir grahāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5637: (AVParis_52,5.2) arciṣmāṃś ca prabhāsaś ca romaśo viṣamāṃs tathā /
GV06avpari_u:5639: (AVParis_52,5.3) ṛṣakaiś caiva rādhātaḥ kumudaḥ phanako ghanaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5640: eṣām aśveti vijñeyā ārās tu parisarpakāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5643: (AVParis_52,5.5) atisaṃtānakāś tv anye ṣaṣṭir vāyoḥ sutā grahāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5645: (AVParis_52,6.1) miśrībhūtās tu te jñeyā guṇṭhitā iva reṇunā /
GV06avpari_u:5646: dhūmaketoḥ sutā jñeyāḥ śatam ekādhikaṃ ca tat //
GV06avpari_u:5649: (AVParis_52,6.3) ye tu nakṣatravaṃśasya bhāgam uttaram āśritāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5651: (AVParis_52,6.4) vyālakasya tu ye putrāḥ saptaṣaṣṭiḥ samantataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5654: ekatārā dvitārā vā atha vā pañcatārakaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5655: (AVParis_52,7.1) brahmarāśes tu te putrā grahāḥ saṃtānasaṃsthitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5658: pañcaṣaṣṭis tu te jñeyāḥ prājāpatyā grahāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5660: dṛśyante kārmukā nāma saptatyekā samāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5666: daṇḍāś ca rāhuputrāḥ syur nāmabhis tulyavarcasaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5671: (AVParis_52,8.4) pannagās tu caturviṃśat kṛṣṇā dvātriṃśatir grahāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5676: uttarāparatas tv ekaḥ pītarakto grahaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5678: yaḥ saṃdhivelāsv arkābho dikṣu sarvāsu dṛśyate //
GV06avpari_u:5679: (AVParis_52,9.3) nātidūre raveḥ snigdhaḥ sa varṣāyābhayāya ca /
GV06avpari_u:5682: saptaite sthāvarā jñeyāḥ saha sūryeṇa sarpiṇaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5686: dṛḍhavratas triśaṅkuś ca ajau vaiśvānare mṛḍaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5687: (AVParis_52,10.2) aruṇaś ca danuś caiva yāmyāyāṃ sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5688: gautamo 'trir vasiṣṭhaś ca viśvāmitras tu kaśyapaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5689: (AVParis_52,10.3) ṛcīkaputraś ca tathā bharadvājaś ca vīryavān /
GV06avpari_u:5690: ete sapta mahātmāna udīcyāṃ sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5692: pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ somo bhṛgur aṅgirasā saha //
GV06avpari_u:5693: (AVParis_52,10.5) hāhāhūhū ca vijñeyau viṣṇoś ca padam uttamam /
GV06avpari_u:5699: (AVParis_52,11.3) hrasvāny asnehayuktāni na bhāvāya bhavanti hi /
GV06avpari_u:5700: yat kiṃcit sthāvaraṃ loke tat prasanneṣu vardhate //
GV06avpari_u:5702: ādityaś caiva śukraś ca lohitāṅgas tathaiva ca //
GV06avpari_u:5704: aindra āgneyo yāmyaś ca nairṛto vāruṇas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:5705: (AVParis_52,12.1) vāyavyaś caiva saumyaś ca brāhmaś caivāṣṭamo grahaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5707: (AVParis_52,12.2) yugagrahā na cānye te tatrāṣṭau diggrahāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5710: mṛtyor niśvāsajāś cānye jñeyāḥ ṣoḍaśa ketavaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5714: dakṣayajñe tu rudrasya krodhād anye tu niḥsṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5716: sapta paitāmahās tv anye tiryaggā jarjaragrahāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5718: śvetaketava ity anye vyākhyātā daśa pañca ca //
GV06avpari_u:5720: te syuḥ śvetaśikhāḥ sarve saumyāḥ kāntās tanuprabhāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5725: (AVParis_52,14.1) brahmakopamayas tv eko viśvātmā sarvato grahaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5728: pūrvato 'bhyuditā vā syur nīcair uttaratas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:5730: sarva eva tu vijñeyā grahā mandaphalodayāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5732: sarve te sarvato hanyur aśubhaṃ yad vadanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:5736: paśusasyopaghātaiś ca hanyur anyaiś ca kāraṇaiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5738: hanyuḥ pañcavidhaṃ sarve ketavo nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5741: dāruṇeṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu vidyāt tatsadṛśaṃ phalam //
GV06avpari_u:5743: sarva evoditā hanyuḥ sarva eva mahāgrahāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5744: (AVParis_52,15.5) mṛtyoḥ kālasya sūryasya brahmaṇas tryambakasya ca /
GV06avpari_u:5745: bhaumasya rāhor agneś ca prajātā ye sudāruṇāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5746: (AVParis_52,16.1) prajāpateś ca dharmasya somasya varuṇasya ca /
GV06avpari_u:5747: pītādyāś ca diśāṃ putrā vijñeyā mṛdudāruṇāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5750: (AVParis_52,16.3) śukrādīnāṃ ca ye putrā grahāṇāṃ parikīrtitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5751: teṣāṃ vīryāṇi jāniyāt pitṛbhyaḥ sādhikāni tu //
GV06avpari_u:5753: grahāṇāṃ saṃgraho hy evam eṣa kārtsnyena kīrtitaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5758: (AVParis_52,16.7) tat prayāti śamaṃ sarvaṃ prajānāṃ tu sukhaṃ bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:5761: (AVParis_53,1.1) om upetya yaś candramasaṃ raviṃ vā gṛhṇāti sūnor asurasya putraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5766: tadā karoty adbhutadarśanāni yair jñāyate rāhur upaiṣyatīti //
GV06avpari_u:5767: (AVParis_53,1.3) udvepate tadā candro yadā rāhuḥ pradṛśyate //
GV06avpari_u:5768: pāṇḍur vā jāyate klībaḥ śaśo vāsya vivardhate //
GV06avpari_u:5770: vadanti ca bhaṛśaṃ śvāno vānti vātāś ca bhīṣaṇāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5771: (AVParis_53,1.5) saṃdhyayor ubhayoś colkā gavāṃ prakṣīyate payaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5772: kṣīriṇām aiva vṛkṣāṇāṃ tad ahar naśyate payaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5774: ūrdhvaṃ vadati gomāyur yadā rāhuḥ pradṛśyate //
GV06avpari_u:5776: ā paurṇamāsyā dṛśyeran sūryasya ca tathobhayoḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5777: (AVParis_53,2.3) udito gṛhyamāṇas tu hanti vedavido janān /
GV06avpari_u:5778: bālāṃś ca jaṭilān hanti ye ca kāṣāyavāsasaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5779: (AVParis_53,2.4) yauvanasthāṃś ca pūrvāhṇe hanti yajñavido janān /
GV06avpari_u:5780: audakāni ca sarvāṇi nāgendrāś cātra duḥkhitāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5781: (AVParis_53,2.5) atha madhyapathaṃ prāptaḥ śūdrān hanti ca taskarān /
GV06avpari_u:5783: (AVParis_53,3.1) pralambaḥ pramadān hanti kṣatraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5784: traigartāś cātra pīḍyante ye ca daṇḍabhṛto janāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5787: (AVParis_53,3.3) śāradaṃ trīṇi varṣāṇi sasyaṃ jātaṃ na pacyate /
GV06avpari_u:5789: (AVParis_53,3.4) sarvaṃ saṃgrasate jyotiś ciram antardadhāti vā /
GV06avpari_u:5790: hanti sphītāni rāṣṭrāṇi pradhānaṃ ca mahīpatim //
GV06avpari_u:5793: rāhur ubhau śaśibhāskarau grasati pakṣam anantaram antataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5794: puruṣaśoṇitakardamavāhinī bhavati bhūr na ca varṣati mādhavaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5795: (AVParis_53,4.1) gṛhītvā bhāskaraṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhṇāti śaśinaṃ yadi /
GV06avpari_u:5796: taṃ tu somottaraṃ nāśas tatra rdhyante hi devatāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5797: (AVParis_53,4.2) vayasāṃ maraṇaṃ chidre prakīrṇe rakṣasāṃ vadhaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5798: nāgānāṃ tu mahānāge chidre devo na varṣati //
GV06avpari_u:5799: (AVParis_53,4.3) śveto varṇo brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu lohitaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5800: vaiśyānāṃ pītako varṇaḥ śūdrāṇāṃ kṛṣṇa ucyate //
GV06avpari_u:5801: (AVParis_53,4.4) eteṣāṃ yena varṇena rāhuś carati bhāskare /
GV06avpari_u:5802: yā jātis tasya varṇasya tāṃ sa pīḍayate grahaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5803: (AVParis_53,4.5) śyāmo bhavati vātāya draukṣo bhavati vṛṣṭaye /
GV06avpari_u:5805: (AVParis_53,5.1) tāmro bhavati śastrāya śastrāya rūkṣo bhavati mṛtyave /
GV06avpari_u:5806: bahvākāras tu bhūtānāṃ ghoraṃ janayate jvaram //
GV06avpari_u:5810: amātyo hanti rājānaṃ rājā vāmātyam ātmaha //
GV06avpari_u:5811: (AVParis_53,5.4) yasya rājñaś ca nakṣatre svarbhānur uparajyati /
GV06avpari_u:5814: kṣipraṃ vāpy uditaṃ brūhi sarvabhūtabhayāya vai //
GV06avpari_u:5815: (AVParis_53,6.2) pradakṣiṇe tu somasya apasavye tu vigrahaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5816: raśmibhede bhayaṃ ghoram ullekhe mantriṇāṃ vadhaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5817: (AVParis_53,6.3) darśayitvā tu rūpāṇi yadā rāhur na dṛśyate /
GV06avpari_u:5821: (AVParis_53,6.5) candrasūryagrahe nādyād adyāt snātvā tu muktayoḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5823: (AVParis_53,6.6) tataḥ ṣaṭsu tataḥ ṣaṭsu tato 'dhyardheṣū vā punaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5825: (AVParis_53,6.7) tataḥ ṣaṭsu tataḥ ṣaṭsu triṣu varṣeṣu vā punaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5826: etāvad eva rāhos tu cāram āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5828: (AVParis_54,1.1) oṃ bhārgavas tu purovāca maharṣīn bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5830: (AVParis_54,1.2) nimittani ca vakṣyāmitasyoktāni hi yāni tu /
GV06avpari_u:5832: (AVParis_54,1.3) viprāñ śvetākṛtir hanti kṣatriyān hanti lohitaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:5833: vaiśyāṃs tu pītako hanti śūdrān hanti tathāsitaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5834: (AVParis_54,1.4) itarān pīḍayet ketur anyavarṇo yadā bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:5836: (AVParis_54,1.5) śvetaḥ śastrākulaṃ kuryāl lohitas tv agnito bhayam. kṣudbhayaṃ pītakaḥ kuryāt kṛṣṇo rogam atholbaṇam //
GV06avpari_u:5837: (AVParis_54,2.1) yasmin deśe śiras tasya sa deśaḥ pīḍyate bhṛśam /
GV06avpari_u:5838: madhye tu madhyamā pīḍā yato pucchaṃ tato jayaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:5840: dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sukhāyaiva hrasvaḥ sthūlo vināśakṛt //

GV06avpari_u:6665: ud uttamaṃ pradhānaṃ syāt pañcājyāhutayas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:6666: (AVParis_67,2.4) varuṇas pāśapāṇis ca yadāsāṃ patir eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:6667: śe.aṃ tu pūrvavat ca eva carutantraṃ samāpayet //
GV06avpari_u:6668: (AVParis_67,2.5) vimuktotpātadoṣas tu jīvet tu śaradas śatam //
GV06avpari_u:6669: (AVParis_67,3.1) gṛhe yasya patet gṛdhra ulūko vā kathaṃ cana /
GV06avpari_u:6670: kapotas praviśet ca eva jīvā vā araṇyasaṃbhavās //
GV06avpari_u:6671: (AVParis_67,3.2) dhuryau ca patato yuktau gostrījanma ca vaikṛtam /
GV06avpari_u:6672: jāyante yamalāni eva ghoras svapnas ca dṛśyate //
GV06avpari_u:6673: (AVParis_67,3.3) abhidravanti rakṣāṃsi yatra ca eva kumārakān /
GV06avpari_u:6675: (AVParis_67,3.4) ālasya ca evam eteṣāṃ devatā yama ucyate /
GV06avpari_u:6676: nāke suparṇam iti etat sthālīpākasya homayet //
GV06avpari_u:6677: (AVParis_67,3.5) yamas pretapatis ca eva daṇḍapāṇis tathā īśvaras /
GV06avpari_u:6679: (AVParis_67,4.1) anagnir utthito yasya dhūmo vā api gṛhe kva cit /
GV06avpari_u:6680: āmaṃ vā jvalate māṃsaṃ bhaveyur visphuliṅgakās //
GV06avpari_u:6685: akāle ca diśāṃ dāha oṣadhīnāṃ ca pācanam //
GV06avpari_u:6686: (AVParis_67,4.4) hastinyas ca eva madyante agnirūpaṃ tad adbhutam /
GV06avpari_u:6688: (AVParis_67,4.5) agnir hiraṇyapatis ca arciṣpāṇis tathā īśvaras /
GV06avpari_u:6690: (AVParis_67,5.1) suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vajraṃ vaiḍūryaṃ mauktikāni ca /
GV06avpari_u:6692: (AVParis_67,5.2) ārambhās ca vipadyante na soddhis karmaṇām api /
GV06avpari_u:6693: carur vaiśravaṇas tatra abhi tyaṃ devam ṛk smṛtā //
GV06avpari_u:6696: (AVParis_67,6.1) atha yasya svanakṣatre ulkā nirghāta eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:6697: rāhur grasati candrārkau kabandhaṃ darpaṇe bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:6698: (AVParis_67,6.2) patet svayaṃ vā musalaṃ devatā vā kathaṃ cana /
GV06avpari_u:6699: unmīlate ca eva yadā tathā ca api nimīlate //
GV06avpari_u:6700: (AVParis_67,6.3) prachidyate ca yadi vā tathā vā api prakampate /
GV06avpari_u:6701: prayāto vā api dṛśyeta pratisroto nadī vahet //
GV06avpari_u:6702: (AVParis_67,6.4) vimale na eva arkachāyā pratīpā vā api tu sāyakās /
GV06avpari_u:6704: (AVParis_67,6.5) kośāt khaḍgā nirgirante tūṇāt ca eva tu sāyakās /
GV06avpari_u:6706: (AVParis_67,6.6) caruṇā vaiṣṇavena eṣāṃ yāgas kartavyas eva tu /
GV06avpari_u:6707: idaṃ viṣṇus pradhānaṃ syāt pañcājyāhutayas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:6710: (AVParis_67,7.1) ativāto yatra bhavet rūpaṃ vā yatra vaikṛtam /
GV06avpari_u:6712: (AVParis_67,7.2) gṛdhrās ca tathā gomāyus kṛkalāsā vadanti ca /
GV06avpari_u:6713: māṃsapeśaṃ ca rudhiraṃ pāṃsuvṛṣṭis tathā eva ca //
GV06avpari_u:6715: vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ vāyau ā yāhi darśata iti sthālīpākasya homayet //
GV06avpari_u:6716: (AVParis_67,7.4) vāyur mahān nabhapatir vajrapāṇis tathā īśvaras /
GV06avpari_u:6718: (AVParis_67,7.5) hutvā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca eva carutantraṃ samāpayet /
GV06avpari_u:6719: vimuktotpātadoṣas tu jīvet tu śaradas śatam //
GV06avpari_u:6720: (AVParis_67,8.1) atha ced anyaśākhasu kartā bhavati vedavit /
GV06avpari_u:6723: vācayet tam upādhyāyaṃ vastreṇa kanakena vā //
GV06avpari_u:6724: (AVParis_67,8.3) dṛṣṭāṃ ca eva adbhutaṃ yasmins tat ca api pratipādayet /
GV06avpari_u:6725: etās tu dakṣiṇās sarvās śaktiyukto na hāpayet //
GV06avpari_u:6726: (AVParis_67,8.4) yajamānas tatsuto vā yas svayaṃ kartum arhati /
GV06avpari_u:6727: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa dadyāt tāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śubhām //
GV06avpari_u:6728: (AVParis_67,8.5) japtvā atharvaśiras ca eva kuryāt vipreṣu pūjanam /
GV06avpari_u:6729: śaktyā atha bhojanaṃ ca eva kuryāt vipreṣu pūjanam //
GV06avpari_u:6731: caturṇām api varṇānāṃ yas kuryāt śraddhayā anvitas //
GV06avpari_u:6732: (AVParis_67,8.7) maraṇaṃ na bhavet tasya na duḥkhaṃ na daridratā /
GV06avpari_u:6733: sidhyanti sarvakāryāṇi dharme ca asya matir bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:6738: (AVParis_68,1.1) om athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi yad uktaṃ padmayoninā /
GV06avpari_u:6741: śaśaṃsire purā yaṃ hi śaunakāya mahātmane //
GV06avpari_u:6746: (AVParis_68,1.5) teṣāṃ tathā phalaṃ vidyāt saṃnipāte yathākramam /
GV06avpari_u:6748: (AVParis_68,1.6) eṣāṃ prakṛtitulyānāṃ niṣiktānāṃ tu teṣu vai /
GV06avpari_u:6749: saṃyogeṣu ca jātānāṃ tulya prakṛtitā bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:6757: lālanāḥ śithilāṅgāś ca priyāś ca priyāś ca lavaṇās tathā //
GV06avpari_u:6758: (AVParis_68,1.11) tanutvaṅnakharomāṇas tv ācāryās tīkṣṇa eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:6766: (AVParis_68,1.15) viśuṣkāṇi ca vastrāṇi rudhirāṅgāṃs tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:6767: dahanādīṃś ca devāṃś ca raktam induṃ sugandhikān //
GV06avpari_u:6772: (AVParis_68,1.18) uṣṇārtāḥ śītakāmās tu nimajjanti pibanti ca /
GV06avpari_u:6773: kalahaṃ caiva kurvanti duḥkhāny anubhavanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:6774: (AVParis_68,1.19) strībhiś caiva vimānyante kṣayante klāmayanti ca /
GV06avpari_u:6776: (AVParis_68,1.20) prakṛtisvapnabhāvaiś ca śleṣmikāṇy api me śṛṇu /
GV06avpari_u:6783: cirād gṛhṇanti suciraṃ gṛhītaṃ dhārayanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:6784: (AVParis_68,1.24) na krudhyanti cirāt kruddhāḥ saṃbhavanty antakopamāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6785: pūjābhir vipulāṃ bhūmim āvahanti kulasya ca //
GV06avpari_u:6786: (AVParis_68,1.25) khyāpayanti ca sarvatra guṇaiś ca vipulair yaśaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6801: spaṣṭatāraṃ tu haṃsāś ca vyopoḍhanti nabhastalam //
GV06avpari_u:6805: śubhrāṇi ca vimānāni phalāni madhurāṇi ca //
GV06avpari_u:6820: (AVParis_68,1.42) kṣāmā bhinnāḥ sadoṣāś ca satataṃ vānavasthitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6822: (AVParis_68,1.43) akasmāt kopanāś cāpi rodanā dhamānās tathā /
GV06avpari_u:6831: bhramanti ghnanti dhāvanti ūrdhvebhyaḥ prapatanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:6834: (AVParis_68,1.49) etās tisraḥ prakṛtayaḥ saṃsṛṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6835: (AVParis_68,1.50) samyak karaṇavijñānaṃ tathā svapnād bhavet phalam /
GV06avpari_u:6836: śubhaṃ vāpi aśubhaṃ vāpi nirdeṣṭavyam aśeṣataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6840: svapnamālāṃ tu yaḥ paśyed yāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā na tu smaret //
GV06avpari_u:6841: (AVParis_68,1.53) naite phalaṃ prayacchanti gargasya vacanaṃ yathā /
GV06avpari_u:6844: dṛṣṭvā bhogam asuptavyaṃ tataḥ prāpya śubhaṃ phalam //
GV06avpari_u:6847: samudraṃ vāhinīṃ dvīpaṃ laṅghayed vā vasuṃdharām //
GV06avpari_u:6851: sarpiṣā pāyasaṃ bhuṅkte gāṃ duhan yaś ca budhyati //
GV06avpari_u:6854: (AVParis_68,2.5) ā kaṇṭhaṃ majjate yo hi mānavaḥ śoṇitārṇave /
GV06avpari_u:6856: (AVParis_68,2.6) mahīṃ vā kampayed yas tu cālayed vā punar girīm /
GV06avpari_u:6857: śvetam aśvam athāruhya pāṇḍuraṃ vāpu yo gajam //
GV06avpari_u:6859: aṅgavṛddhiṃ śirovṛddhiṃ prāpnuyād yas tu mānavaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6860: (AVParis_68,2.8) brāhmaṇo vāpi rājā vā svapne yad abhiṣecayet /
GV06avpari_u:6861: rājā tu pārthivo jñeyaḥ kroṣṭuker vacanaṃ yathā //
GV06avpari_u:6862: (AVParis_68,2.9) śiro vā chidyate yasya vimānaṃ śoṇitaṃ tathā /
GV06avpari_u:6863: senāpatyaṃ mahac cāyur arthalābhaṃ tathaiva ca //
GV06avpari_u:6864: (AVParis_68,2.10) vibhūṣaṇaṃ ca vidyāṃ ca karṇachedam avāpnuyāt /
GV06avpari_u:6866: (AVParis_68,2.11) uraḥ sahasralābhaḥ syāt pādachede tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:6871: vimalānāṃ jalānāṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ tu nidarśanam //
GV06avpari_u:6880: (AVParis_68,2.18) ghātanaṃ śvāpadānāṃ ca pāṇau ca rudhirāgamaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6882: (AVParis_68,2.19) labhate nātra saṃdeho bhārgavasya vaco tathā /
GV06avpari_u:6883: śuklāḥ sumanasaḥ kanyā dadhi gobrāhmaṇaṃ vṛṣam //
GV06avpari_u:6885: suhṛdaḥ saphalā vṛkṣā nakṣatrāṇy amalaṃ jalam //
GV06avpari_u:6888: (AVParis_68,2.22) dṛṣṭvā yas tatkṣaṇaṃ budhyet tasya kalyāṇam ādiśet /
GV06avpari_u:6889: vṛkṣān gulmāṃś ca vallīś ca svagṛhe puṣpitā naraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6890: (AVParis_68,2.23) śuklavāsāḥ striyaś cāpi yaḥ paśyec chrīs tu taṃ bhajet /
GV06avpari_u:6892: (AVParis_68,2.24) dīptāṅgo labhate bhūmiṃ vardhamānāṅga eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:6894: (AVParis_68,2.25) śokārto labhate tuṣṭiṃ mṛtaś cāyur avāpnuyāt /
GV06avpari_u:6896: (AVParis_68,2.26) yaḥ svapne saṃbhayed ugraṃ pārakyaṃ so 'rtham āpnuyāt /
GV06avpari_u:6898: (AVParis_68,2.27) kāñcanaṃ paśyate yas tu tathā strīṃ labhate naraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6900: (AVParis_68,2.28) mattaṃ kareṇum āruhya parastrīṃ labhate naraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6901: kumārīṃ labhate nārīm āyasair nigaḍair naraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6902: (AVParis_68,2.29) baddhvā navāṃ tu yo mālām utpālānāṃ vibudhyate /
GV06avpari_u:6904: (AVParis_68,2.30) bhṛṅgāro darpaṇo vāpi labdhvā putrāgamaṃ vadet /
GV06avpari_u:6907: cipiṭaḥ kālako nagnaḥ śravaṇo mehate yadi //
GV06avpari_u:6908: (AVParis_68,2.32) vidikthaḥ sravate cārmiḥ svapne varṣaṃ samādiśet /
GV06avpari_u:6909: sūkarīṃ mahiṣīṃ vāpi hastinīṃ śakunīṃ tathā //
GV06avpari_u:6910: (AVParis_68,2.33) svapne yadā prasūyeta subhikṣaṃ nirdiśet tadā /
GV06avpari_u:6912: (AVParis_68,2.34) yeṣāṃ svapne pralīyante teṣāṃ vṛddhim athādiśet /
GV06avpari_u:6913: govṛṣaṃ puruṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ hastinaṃ parvataṃ gṛham //
GV06avpari_u:6915: daivatāni dvijā gāvaḥ pitaro liṅgino grahāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6916: (AVParis_68,2.36) yad vadanti naraṃ svapne tat tathaiva vinirdiśet /
GV06avpari_u:6918: (AVParis_68,2.37) narasya śoṇitaṃ pītvā prakṛtāṇl labhate naraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6922: (AVParis_68,2.39) kṛmiṇatvaṃ bhaved dhanyaṃ kroṣṭuker vacanaṃ yathā /
GV06avpari_u:6925: yadyad ujjvalavad dravyaṃ tattat sukhakaraṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:6926: (AVParis_68,2.41) yadyad virudhyate vāpi svapne tat tasya nirdiśet /
GV06avpari_u:6929: hasadbhir vā parivṛto nṛtyadbhiḥ svajanair api //
GV06avpari_u:6931: ratham āruhya yo yāyād akṣatas tu yugaṃdharaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6934: (AVParis_68,2.45) nīyate puruṣair yaś ca pāśahastair viśeṣataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6936: (AVParis_68,2.46) piṇyākasya tilānāṃ ca karṣāsu lavaṇasya ca /
GV06avpari_u:6944: (AVParis_68,2.50) prasanne tu dhruvaṃ śoko rajjuchede mriyeta saḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6945: rūḍhasya srotasā śoko mṛtyuḥ sriotasi naśyataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:6947: bhrātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi putraṃ vā nāśayanti te //
GV06avpari_u:6948: (AVParis_68,2.52) dvāre vā sārgale vāpi śayyāṃ śakhāṃ tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:6949: svapne yasya pranaśyanti bhāryā tasya vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:6950: (AVParis_68,2.53) kṛkalāso vṛko vāpi puruṣo vāpi piṅgalaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6953: kṛṣṇasya vā śiraś chindyāt putras tasya vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:6954: (AVParis_68,2.55) rājaputraś ca coraś ca rājabhṛṭyaś ca yo bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:6955: tasya svapnāḥ phalaṃ dadyur eteṣu yad udāhṛtam //
GV06avpari_u:6956: (AVParis_68,2.56) yeṣāṃ lābhe bhaved vṛddhis teṣāṃ nāśe guṇo bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:6957: yeṣāṃ lābhe bhaved dhānis teṣāṃ lābhe guṇo bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:6958: (AVParis_68,2.57) śubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu yaḥ svapne punaḥ paśyaty apūjitam /
GV06avpari_u:6959: śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vāpi yat paścāt tatphalaṃ labhet //
GV06avpari_u:6962: (AVParis_68,2.59) māsiko govisarge tu sadyaḥpākaḥ prabhātike. kālaḥ pañcasv avasthāsu śarvaryāḥ kīrtitaḥ pṛthak //
GV06avpari_u:6966: śāntikriyā svastyayanakriyā ca duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti //
GV06avpari_u:6969: (AVParis_68,3.1) imān dṛṣṭvāśubhān svapnān prātar utthāya satvaraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6973: (AVParis_68,3.3) yo na jīvaḥ paro 'pehi vidma te svapna vedanam /
GV06avpari_u:6974: rocanā sarṣapā mṛdā samit sakusumaṃ dadhi //
GV06avpari_u:6975: (AVParis_68,3.4) gām ajaṃ kanakaṃ sattvaṃ kumārīṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śubham /
GV06avpari_u:6976: abhivandya nṛpo yāyāt suhṛdāṃś ca manoharān //
GV06avpari_u:6977: (AVParis_68,3.5) yadā tu yātrāṃ nṛpatiḥ kartum icched vidhānavit /
GV06avpari_u:6980: tāṃ niśaṃ saṃviśed rājā bhūmau caivābhimantrayet //
GV06avpari_u:6982: evam uktvā narapatiḥ prayatātmā tataḥ svapet //
GV06avpari_u:6985: (AVParis_68,3.9) māhendrīm amṛtāṃ raudrīṃ kuryād vāpy aparājitām /
GV06avpari_u:6986: kauberīṃ vā prayuñjīta ādityāṃ vā sadakṣiṇām //
GV06avpari_u:6987: (AVParis_68,3.10) rajanikaradivākarau karābhyāṃ spṛśati yadā grasate 'tha vā narendraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6988: lavaṇajalanidhiṃ nadīṃ ca dorbhyāṃ tarati hradāpadakardamaṃ tamo vā //
GV06avpari_u:6989: (AVParis_68,3.11) naraturagamahīruhān nagān vā bhavanacarān na virohayed gajān vā /
GV06avpari_u:6990: jvalanamaraṇakālavṛddhayogān yadi nṛpa ātmagatāṃś ca paśyatīha //
GV06avpari_u:6991: (AVParis_68,3.12) yadi ca nṛpatir ātmano 'bhracārair bhramati mahīṃ sapurāṃ parikṣipet /
GV06avpari_u:6992: yadi ca sa ciramagnagātramātro bhramati nṛpo grasate 'tha medinīṃ vā //
GV06avpari_u:6993: (AVParis_68,3.13) yadi ca jayati damṣṭriṇo narān vā yadi ca bhavet sitamālyadānadhārī /
GV06avpari_u:6994: yadi ca ruditi caivam ādi dṛṣṭvā paraviṣayaṃ hṛṣitas tatas tu yāyāt //
GV06avpari_u:6996: malinavasanajīrṇaraktavāsā yadi sumanobhir alaṃkṛtaḥ svayaṃ vā //
GV06avpari_u:6997: (AVParis_68,4.2) svapiti jayati khādati prahṛṣṭo vilapati nartati gāyanaprahāsaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:6998: bhavati ca mudito labheta kanyāṃ yadi nṛpatir nayaśo bhavej jayārthī //
GV06avpari_u:7000: vinihataturagadvipo narendro yadi patitadhvajavāṃs tato na yāyāt //
GV06avpari_u:7001: (AVParis_68,4.4) narapatir aparājitaḥ parair yo yadi ca paraiḥ parihasyate madadbhiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7005: (AVParis_68,4.5) svapnān dṛṣṭvā śubhān rājā japadbhir abhimantritaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7010: mātaraṃ praviśed yaś ca jvalitaṃ ca hutāśanam //
GV06avpari_u:7011: (AVParis_68,5.2) prāsadāt parvatāgrād vā pated yaś cāpi mānavaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7012: magnaḥ kardamakūpeṣu jale yaś cāpi naśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7013: (AVParis_68,5.3) drumam unmūlayed yas tu paśyed rājñopasevakam /
GV06avpari_u:7016: vivarṇo vāpi pāśair yo badhyate mriyate tu saḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7017: (AVParis_68,5.5) kāṃsyaṃ vā kāṃsyapātrīṃ vā yasya tejo 'dhirohati /
GV06avpari_u:7023: (AVParis_68,5.8) śvā vā ajagaro godhā tarakṣu śalyako 'pi vā /
GV06avpari_u:7026: svapne yam upatiṣṭhanti vyādhis tam upatiṣṭhati //
GV06avpari_u:7034: ānandaś ca pramodaś ca vyasanasya ca darśanam //
GV06avpari_u:7037: (AVParis_68,5.15) ulkābhedās tathā pañca pariveṣā nava smṛtāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7040: viṃśatī dve ca vijñeyā bhedā hy ulkādiṣu smṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7048: satataṃ cānulipyas tu puṣpair dhūpair yathoditaiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7052: tasminn evāntare śānte goṣṭhe vā jalasaṃnidhau //
GV06avpari_u:7053: (AVParis_68,5.23) nirgatya nagarād vāpi śucau deśe samāhitaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7056: aṅgāni kuryur anye ca śatasaṃkhyā dvijottamāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7058: te sadasyā iti proktā vācane yajñakarmaṇi //
GV06avpari_u:7060: sarvakarmasu vettā ya ānayet so 'py athādarāt //
GV06avpari_u:7061: (AVParis_68,5.27) bhūmiṃ saṃśodhya vidhivat kṛtvā tatra ca maṇḍapam /
GV06avpari_u:7062: vidhivat kalpayed vediṃ yajñapātrāṇi ca svayam //
GV06avpari_u:7065: (AVParis_68,5.29) annair vastraiś ca vividhaiḥ saṃyuktāṃ bahudakṣiṇām /
GV06avpari_u:7066: kārayitvā mahāśāntiṃ varaṃ gāṃ ca nivedayet //
GV06avpari_u:7069: (AVParis_68,5.31) mahat sukham avāpnoti kāryasiddhiṃ ca vindati /
GV06avpari_u:7074: (AVParis_69,1.2) kāmā hi bahavo loke saṃsthitā bhinnasādhanāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7075: ekam eva paraṃ teṣāṃ samyak tvaṃ brūhy asaṃśayam //
GV06avpari_u:7081: duḥsādhyāni nimittāni tāni vedmi hi kāni cit //
GV06avpari_u:7082: (AVParis_69,2.1) akāle yasya jāyante dantāḥ keśair vivarjitaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7084: (AVParis_69,2.2) dvidantaś cāpi jāyeta tasya karma svaśākhikam /
GV06avpari_u:7085: svaśākhāyāṃ tu yat proktaṃ kuryād vātharvaṇaṃ vidhim //
GV06avpari_u:7086: (AVParis_69,2.3) dvimūrdhā vā trinetro vā tathaikākṣir dvināsikaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7087: hīnahasto 'paro hy arthe na tv atharvaśirāḥ sa ca //
GV06avpari_u:7091: homaṃ kuryād atharvā tu tena nandati satkulam //
GV06avpari_u:7092: (AVParis_69,3.1) na labhed yady atharvāṇaṃ kuryād daśaguṇaṃ svayam /
GV06avpari_u:7093: mahāvyāhṛtihomaṃ ca sāvitraṃ japam eva ca //
GV06avpari_u:7094: (AVParis_69,3.2) vikṛtāṅgo 'dhikāṅgo vā jāto hīnāṅgo eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:7095: kulasyādbhutam atyarthaṃ tad atharvā śamaṃ nayet //
GV06avpari_u:7097: yasmin rāṣṭre nṛpas tatra ṣaṇmāsādd hi vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7099: vṛkṣe 'nyavṛkṣajaṃ puṣpaṃ jāyate phalam eva vā //
GV06avpari_u:7101: kārayeta mahāśāntiṃ rāṣṭrasya ca purasya ca //
GV06avpari_u:7105: akasmān nirjalā vā syād aśoṣā vā mahāsarit //
GV06avpari_u:7107: kuryuḥ śāntim atharvāṇo dvijā hy eteṣu bheṣajam //
GV06avpari_u:7109: paṭhan na labhate vidyāṃ dvijaḥ śṛṇvann api śrutam //
GV06avpari_u:7110: (AVParis_69,4.5) ādhitsur api nādhānaṃ kuryād āvāsam eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:7111: kanyā pariṇinīṣur vā kāmyeṣv iṣṭapatiṃ na ca //
GV06avpari_u:7112: (AVParis_69,5.1) vandhyā vā mṛtavatsā yā durbhagā strīprasū ca yā /
GV06avpari_u:7113: sakṛtprasūtā yā nārī garbhaṃ gṛhṇāti naiva ca //
GV06avpari_u:7115: na sūtiṃ labhate yā tu bahuputrīyate ca yā //
GV06avpari_u:7118: (AVParis_69,5.4) athāpahantuṃ bhayam evamādikaṃ yadābhilaṣyet phalam uktam eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:7119: tadāṅgirasyaṃ varamantrasaṃpadā sphurantam uccaiḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajed dvijam //
GV06avpari_u:7120: (AVParis_69,5.5) rātrau dvichāyavṛkṣaṃ vā kusvapnaṃ vāpi riṣṭadam /
GV06avpari_u:7122: (AVParis_69,6.1) jvālādbhutāny atha proktāni yāni ulkādibhedā gaditās tathā ye /
GV06avpari_u:7123: svapnādbhutāny api vānyādbhutāni gṛheṣu yāny arthavido vadanti //
GV06avpari_u:7124: (AVParis_69,6.2) eteṣu śāntiṃ kurvīta amṛtāṃ vā sadakṣiṇām /
GV06avpari_u:7125: raudrīṃ vā vaiśvadevīṃ vā abhayāṃ vāparājitām //
GV06avpari_u:7132: (AVParis_69,7.1) yasya rājño janapade sa nāsti vividhair bhayaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7133: pīḍyate tasya tad rāṣṭraṃ paṅle gaur iva majjati //
GV06avpari_u:7136: (AVParis_69,7.3) nityaṃ ca kārayec chāntiṃ grahaṛkṣāṇi pūjayet /
GV06avpari_u:7138: (AVParis_69,7.4) catuṣpatheṣu goṣṭheṣu tīrtheṣv apsu ca kārayet /
GV06avpari_u:7140: (AVParis_69,7.5) evaṃ tu khyāpayan rājā sarvakālaṃ jitendriyaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7141: anantaṃ sukham āpnoti kṛtsnāṃ bhuṅkte vasuṃdharām //
GV06avpari_u:7142: (AVParis_69,8.1) upasthitaṃ mṛtyum api dvijottamaḥ śamaṃ nayet /
GV06avpari_u:7144: (AVParis_69,8.2) dyutiṃ prabhāṃ sadā sphuran mantrapavitravān naraḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7145: nṛpe dhanini cānyatra śāntyāptvā dakṣiṇāṃ budhaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7147: triḥ saṃhitāṃ haviṣyādyaṃ japet kṛcchraṃ ca śuddhaye //
GV06avpari_u:7151: amatsarī nitāntaṃ yaḥ so 'tra śāntiṃ samārabhet //
GV06avpari_u:7153: na nyūnaṃ tatra kiṃcit syād iti tad bhṛgubhāṣitam //
GV06avpari_u:7155: kuryāt sarvam idaṃ jānann atharvahṛdayaṃ budhaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7156: (AVParis_69,9.1) ye na jānanty adhītā api śrutim āṅgirasīṃ dvijāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7157: atharvahṛdayaṃ cāpi na te vedavidaḥ smṛtāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7162: (AVParis_69,9.4) atharvā nādbhutaṃ tasya śāntir eva sadā bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7165: (AVParis_70,1.1) oṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat prājñaṃ vidvāṃso munayaḥ purā /
GV06avpari_u:7168: bhinnānāṃ śamanaṃ noktaṃ vada tv asaṃśayaṃ mune //
GV06avpari_u:7175: (AVParis_70,1.6) teṣām ekaḥ pradhānatve yaḥ śānto dvijasattamaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7177: (AVParis_70,1.7) brahmāṇaṃ taṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād dhotāraṃ sarvavedinam /
GV06avpari_u:7178: evam ukte bhṛguṃ viprāḥ procur vigatakalmaṣam //
GV06avpari_u:7181: (AVParis_70,1.9) tatra śāntau prayuktāyāṃ kasya śāntiphalaṃ bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7182: nṛpo 'py adhārmikaḥ kuryād brahmaṇas tarpaṇaṃ purā //
GV06avpari_u:7183: (AVParis_70,1.10) tataḥ kṛtā mahāśāntī rājānaṃ pāti sarvataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7184: sa vṛtaḥ pāvanaṃ gacched dvijānāṃ pāvanāya vai //
GV06avpari_u:7187: anaśnaṃś ca tryahaṃ dhīraḥ sa puraścaraṇo bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7189: anuktavac ca tryahaṃ tat karmaṇaḥ karaṇe kṣamam //
GV06avpari_u:7190: (AVParis_70,2.3) kṛcchraṃ cāpi hitaṃ kṛtvā kuryuḥ karma samāhitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7192: (AVParis_70,2.4) tataḥ paraṃ purodhaḥsu divyaṃ tatram avāpnuyāt /
GV06avpari_u:7193: grahātithyaṃ ca saṃrabhya diśāṃ yāgaṃ ca sarvataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7194: (AVParis_70,2.5) nakṣatreṣu ca sarveṣu yāgaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7196: (AVParis_70,3.1) sāvitryā lakṣahomaṃ tu bhaume tiṣṭhed viśāradāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7197: kuryur deyaṃ ca dānānāṃ viprebhyo yasya yat priyam //
GV06avpari_u:7199: rathānāṃ vāraṇānāṃ ca dānaṃ kāmam ataḥ param //
GV06avpari_u:7200: (AVParis_70,3.3) tuṣyeyur yena vā viprāḥ saṃbhavo yasya yasya hi /
GV06avpari_u:7201: tat tat sarvam upādeyam eṣa dānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7202: (AVParis_70,3.4) dadyāc ca gurave grāmaṃ dhenuṃ vāsoyugaṃ tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7204: (AVParis_70,3.5) anena vidhinā bhaumam adbhutaṃ śamayed guruḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7205: eṣa eva vidhir jñeyo viyatye 'py adbhutāśraye //
GV06avpari_u:7206: (AVParis_70,4.1) viśeṣo 'yaṃ tu sāvitryā daśalakṣāṃs tu homayet /
GV06avpari_u:7221: sarvadā sarvakāmāṃs tu homaiḥ prāpnoti mānavaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7224: (AVParis_70,4.10) sarveṣāṃ haviṣāṃ caiva ghṛtaṃ śāntikaraṃ smṛtam /
GV06avpari_u:7225: sarvadravye ghṛtaṃ tasmād dhome prakṣepam arhati //
GV06avpari_u:7227: upavītaṃ tu pitryeṣu sarveṣv eva samārabhet //
GV06avpari_u:7240: (AVParis_70,6.3) ghṛte vā madhudadhni vā yadā padmākṛtir bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7241: svastiko vāpi dṛśyeta tadā maraṇam ādiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7243: śrotriyāya tu tad dadyād bhāvaiva śamayen naraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7245: kuryād vā vāruṇīṃ śāntiṃ parameṇa samādhinā //
GV06avpari_u:7246: (AVParis_70,7.1) anyākṛtiṣu vāpy etad ye sthāne śāntikārakāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7248: (AVParis_70,7.2) calite jvalite pāte sphurita utpatite tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7250: (AVParis_70,7.3) tatra yudhyanti jātīnāṃ bhayaṃ tat syād asaṃśayam /
GV06avpari_u:7252: (AVParis_70,7.4) utpātaśamanārthaṃ tu ye kriyā na prayuñjate /
GV06avpari_u:7257: evaṃ kṛte bhayaṃ sarvaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva naśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7265: tata eṣa viśuddhātmā puruṣaḥ sukham edhate //
GV06avpari_u:7266: (AVParis_70,8.5) atha cet sa bahuvidhair adbhutaiḥ parisaṃyutaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7267: saṃvatsaraṃ bhavec chīghraṃ kuryus tacchamanaṃ budhāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7270: (AVParis_70,9.2) pūrvaṃ tāvad viśuddhātmā sa puraścaraṇo bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7272: (AVParis_70,9.3) yāgaṃ kṛtvā grahāṇāṃ tu nakṣatrāṇāṃ tataḥ param /
GV06avpari_u:7274: (AVParis_70,9.4) diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva yamendravaruṇāṃs tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7275: viśveśvaraṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca yajetādbhutakarma ca //
GV06avpari_u:7278: (AVParis_70,9.6) kuryād devādṛto dhīmān evaṃ doṣaḥ praśāmyati //
GV06avpari_u:7279: (AVParis_70,10.1) śvetaṃ vā bhavati payo vilohitaṃ vā pītaṃ vā bhavati hi kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ vā /
GV06avpari_u:7280: utpātaḥ phalati yathā catuḥprakāras tat sarvaṃ śṛṇuta samāsato mayoktam //
GV06avpari_u:7281: (AVParis_70,10.2) viprāṇāṃ bhavati hi śuklam ambudoṣe rājānaṃ sapadi nihanti lohitaṃ ca /
GV06avpari_u:7282: pītaṃ ced bhavati nihanti vaiśyavargaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ bhavati hi kṛṣṇapiṅgadoṣe //
GV06avpari_u:7283: (AVParis_70,10.3) bījaṃ yatra praroheta phalam atha pramādataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7284: etad atyadbhutaṃ nāma dampatyos tu vināśanam //
GV06avpari_u:7286: antaḥkaraṇadoṣāc ca hetoḥ śāntir na jāyate //
GV06avpari_u:7289: (AVParis_70,11.1) vicāritaṃ ca vidvadbhir niścitaṃ sudhiyā punaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7291: (AVParis_70,11.2) codite karmaṇy anyasmin nānyat kuryād vidhānavit /
GV06avpari_u:7292: na ca prārabhya karmāṇi sthātavyaṃ kva cid antare //
GV06avpari_u:7293: (AVParis_70,11.3) nāpi kurvīta matimān kadā cit karmasaṃkaram /
GV06avpari_u:7294: kurvaṃs tu na tathā karma doṣam utpādayed bhṛśam //
GV06avpari_u:7295: (AVParis_70,11.4) anyathākaraṇe doṣān samīkṣya tu bahūn iha /
GV06avpari_u:7297: (AVParis_70,11.5) dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ tu kārtsnyena tataḥ śāntiṃ samārabhet /
GV06avpari_u:7298: asamīkṣya tu kurvāṇo na śāntiṃ labhate naraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7299: (AVParis_70,12.1) vātikasya yathā vaidyaḥ paittikasya ca niścaye /
GV06avpari_u:7301: (AVParis_70,12.2) tasmāt tāvat parīkṣeta yāvan niṣpannam adbhutam /
GV06avpari_u:7303: (AVParis_70,12.3) viguṇaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ tu karma kuryād upadravam /
GV06avpari_u:7305: (AVParis_70,12.4) hetuśrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ ca tasmāt sāguṇyam ācaret /
GV06avpari_u:7306: saguṇe ca kṛte tasmin sarvasaṃpad bhaved dhruvam //
GV06avpari_u:7310: tat tat prāpnoty ayatnena satyam etad dvijottamāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7315: śamanaṃ ca tathā teṣāṃ prabrūhi vinayena me //
GV06avpari_u:7316: (AVParis_70b,1.3) tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7320: (AVParis_70b,1.5) yasmāc ca vāyur valavāñ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvādbhutodbhavaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7321: tasmāt tam eva prathamaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvidhi //
GV06avpari_u:7322: (AVParis_70b,2.1) yānti yānāny ayuktāni vinā nṛbhis tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7323: yuktāni vā na gacchanti narendrāṇāṃ mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7324: (AVParis_70b,2.2) bheryo mṛdaṅgāḥ paṭahā vādyante vāpy anāhatāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7325: āhatāś ca na vādyante acalāni calanti vā //
GV06avpari_u:7327: śarīraṃ vyathate tatra yadi vā veśmani śrutaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7329: śarīraṃ bādhyate tatra vyādhir vā sumahān bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7330: (AVParis_70b,2.5) koṣṭhe vā patate yatra hastād darvī kadā cana /
GV06avpari_u:7331: patate musalaṃ cāpi śūrpaṃ vā dhūyate yadi //
GV06avpari_u:7333: nārīṃ vā dhayate nārī jāyate tumulaṃ bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7338: (AVParis_70b,3.4) saptāham atha vā pakṣaṃ nibadhnāty atidāruṇam /
GV06avpari_u:7339: tryahād yadi na varṣeta ghoraṃ śastrabhayaṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7340: (AVParis_70b,3.5) vāyavyeṣv eva nṛpatir vāyuṃ saptabhir arcayet /
GV06avpari_u:7341: dvāv imāv iti tisro hi japtavyāḥ prayatair dvijaiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7343: vāyavyām eva śāntau ca vāyoḥ savitur āvapet //
GV06avpari_u:7344: (AVParis_70b,4.2) ādāv ante ca madhye ca tathaivam anuyojayet /
GV06avpari_u:7346: (AVParis_70b,4.3) yamakaṃ jāyate puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vā yamakaṃ yadi /
GV06avpari_u:7349: yavā vā vrīhayo vāpi svāmino maraṇāya te //
GV06avpari_u:7353: (AVParis_70b,6.1) anṛtu phalapuṣpaṃ vā na yathartu phalanti vā /
GV06avpari_u:7356: tilā vā samatailāḥ syuḥ surātailā bhavanti vā //
GV06avpari_u:7357: (AVParis_70b,6.3) agrāmyaṃ kārayet puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vā vikṛtaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7358: dhānyānāṃ vaikṛte kṣetraṃ saha sasyena dāpayet //
GV06avpari_u:7359: (AVParis_70b,6.4) sauryaṃ caruṃ puṣpaphale vikṛte paśum eva ca /
GV06avpari_u:7360: kṣaitrapatyaṃ ca bhaumaṃ ca nirvapet sasyavaikṛte //
GV06avpari_u:7361: (AVParis_70b,6.5) sauryī śāntiḥ prayoktavyā sauryair mantrair yathāvidhi /
GV06avpari_u:7362: uccā patantam ity ṛgbhyāṃ garbhaṃ tu parikīrtitam //
GV06avpari_u:7364: sadakṣiṇair dvijair bhuktaiḥ kartāraṃ cārcayet tataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7366: rudanto vā hasanto vā sravanto vā bahūn rasān //
GV06avpari_u:7367: (AVParis_70b,7.3) arogā vā nivāte ca śākhā muñcanty asaṃbhrame /
GV06avpari_u:7368: phalaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā bālā darśayantīti hāsanam //
GV06avpari_u:7370: [kṣipraṃ tatra bhayaṃ ghoraṃ ghoraṃ pravaryteta caturvidham //
GV06avpari_u:7371: (AVParis_70b,7.5) sarpān matsyān pakṣiṇo vā yatra devaḥ pravarṣati /
GV06avpari_u:7373: (AVParis_70b,7.6) surāsavaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ sarpis tailaṃ tathā dadhi /
GV06avpari_u:7374: yatra varṣati parjanyaḥ kṣudragas tatra jāyate //
GV06avpari_u:7375: (AVParis_70b,7.7) ulkātārāś ca dhiṣṇyeṣu yadāṅgārāṃś ca varṣati /
GV06avpari_u:7376: tadā vyādhibhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7377: (AVParis_70b,7.8) nārācāḥ śaktayaḥ khaḍgāḥ pradīpyante yadā muhuḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7378: tadā śastrabhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7379: (AVParis_70b,7.9) pumān aśvo gajo vāpi yadā yatra pradīpyate /
GV06avpari_u:7380: naśyanti sevakās tatra pradhānaś ca vinaṅkṣyati //
GV06avpari_u:7381: (AVParis_70b,7.10) yatra sravec caityavṛkṣaḥ sahasā vividhān rasān /
GV06avpari_u:7382: pṛthakpṛthak samastān vā tat pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam //
GV06avpari_u:7383: (AVParis_70b,7.11) ghṛte madhuni dugdhe ca ghṛte dugdhe tathāmbhasi /
GV06avpari_u:7384: kṣaudre madhuni pānīye ghṛte caivāparaṃ payaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7385: (AVParis_70b,7.12) yatraitac ca mahotpātaṃ vṛkṣeṣu syāt sudāruṇam /
GV06avpari_u:7387: (AVParis_70b,7.13) taile pradhānā vadhyante bhakte kṣudbhayam ādiśet /
GV06avpari_u:7388: anṛtau cet phalaṃ yatra puṣpaṃ vā dṛśyate drume //

GV06avpari_u:7407: (AVParis_70b,7.23) samuddeśe pradīpyante vidyāt tatra bhayaṃ mahat /

GV06avpari_u:7412: (AVParis_70b,8.1) hasane dehanāśaḥ syād yodhā naśyanti śakhayā /

GV06avpari_u:7428: (AVParis_70b,9.4) gandhamālyaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca dīpaṃ dadyāt tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:7430: (AVParis_70b,9.5) pākaś ca daśame māsi śukrasya vacanaṃ yathā /
GV06avpari_u:7431: bṛhaspatis tathāditye bruvete yat tathaiva tat //

GV06avpari_u:7444: (AVParis_70b,11.2) vaḍavā hastinī gaur vā yadi yugmaṃ prasūyate /
GV06avpari_u:7445: vijātaṃ vikṛtaṃ vāpi ṣaṇmāsair mriyate nṛpaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7447: svāmino nagaraṃ yūtham anyathā tu vināśayet //
GV06avpari_u:7448: (AVParis_70b,11.4) viyoniṣu yadā yānti ṃśrībhāvaḥ prajāsv api /
GV06avpari_u:7449: kharoṣṭrahayamātaṅgāḥ pakṣiṇo vā na sādhu tat //
GV06avpari_u:7450: (AVParis_70b,11.5) akāle vāpi mādyante kāle vāpu amadā yadi /

GV06avpari_u:7452: (AVParis_70b,12.1) athānaḍvān anaḍvāhaṃ dhenur dhenuṃ pibed yadi /
GV06avpari_u:7453: śunī vā dhayate dhenuṃ śunīṃ dhenur athāpi vā //
GV06avpari_u:7456: (AVParis_70b,12.3) viceṣṭāṃ vā virāvaṃ vā māsena mriyate nṛpaḥ] /
GV06avpari_u:7459: jaṅgame sthāvaraṃ jātaṃ sthāvare vātha jaṅgamam //
GV06avpari_u:7461: tyāgo vivāso dānaṃ vā dattvāpy āśu śubhaṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7465: prājāpatyāṃ tataḥ śāntiṃ prājārthī kārayen nṛpaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7466: (AVParis_70b,13.3) ādāv ante ca madhye ca śāntāv uktas tu tadgaṇaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7467: ārogyaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva deśe tasmin nṛpe bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7469: susamṛddho 'pi deśaḥ sa kṣipram eva vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7471: autpātikāni dṛśyante rājñas tatra mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7474: (AVParis_70b,14.2) devarājadhvajānāṃ ca patanaṃ bhaṅga eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:7477: saṃdhyā cobhayathā dīptā tatra vidyān mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7478: (AVParis_70b,15.2) yadi vā dīryate 'kasmād bhūmiś chidrībhaved yadi /
GV06avpari_u:7479: prakampate 'timātraṃ vā sarveṣu ca bhayāya tat //
GV06avpari_u:7481: rakṣorūpāṇi dṛśyante na ca rakṣā gṛheṣv api //
GV06avpari_u:7482: (AVParis_70b,15.4) saṃpraviṣṭaiḥ piśācair vā rakṣobhir vāpi tannibhaiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7484: (AVParis_70b,15.5) ṛtavas tu viparyastā brāhmaṇāś ca vidharmiṇaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7486: (AVParis_70b,16.1) apūjyā yatra pūjyante na pūjyante ca pūjitāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7487: pūjyeṣv adānaniṣṭhā ca bhayam īdṛk pradarśanam //
GV06avpari_u:7488: (AVParis_70b,16.2) nādīyante na pūjyante brāhmaṇā balibhiḥ surāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7495: prājāpatyaṃ mahendraṃ ca mahādevam athāpi vā //
GV06avpari_u:7496: (AVParis_70b,17.1) aindrasthāne tu māhendrīṃ raudre raudrīṃ prayojayet /
GV06avpari_u:7498: (AVParis_70b,17.2) gurave tu śataṃ niṣkaṃ prajāsv evaṃ śivaṃ bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7503: tīkṣṇaṃ ca varṣaty anṛtau ṛtuṣv eva na varṣati //
GV06avpari_u:7504: (AVParis_70b,17.5) yadā coṣṇe bhavec chītaṃ śīte coṣṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GV06avpari_u:7505: dṛṣṭo bhāvas tu vikṛto na yathartu svarūpakaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7506: (AVParis_70b,17.6) anārogyaṃ bhavec caiva prajānām iti nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7508: anṛtau tasya deśasya pradhānasya vadho dhruvam //
GV06avpari_u:7509: (AVParis_70b,18.2) śoṇitaṃ varṣate yatra tatra śastrabhayaṃ bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7512: phalaṃ puṣpaṃ śamīdhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā bhayāya tat //
GV06avpari_u:7515: (AVParis_70b,18.5) anabhre vā divā rātrau śvetam indrāyudhaṃ bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7518: (AVParis_70b,19.1) yady anabhre 'pi vimale sūryachāyā na dṛśyate /
GV06avpari_u:7519: na nirabhre pratīpā vā tatra deśabhayaṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7521: annāni sahiraṇyāni dhānyaṃ gāvaś ca dakṣiṇāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7524: (AVParis_70b,19.4) śataṃ niṣkaṃ suvarṇasya dātavyaṃ vā gavāṃ śatam //
GV06avpari_u:7527: na dīpyate sendhano vā sarāṣṭraṃ pīḍayen nṛpam //
GV06avpari_u:7528: (AVParis_70b,19.7) prajvaled dadhi māṃsaṃ vā tathā dūrvāpi kiṃ cana /
GV06avpari_u:7529: agniṃ vinā yadāśuṣkaṃ niyataṃ nṛpater vadhaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7530: (AVParis_70b,20.1) prāsādaṃ toraṇaṃ dvāraṃ prākāraṃ kāśyapaṃ gṛham /
GV06avpari_u:7532: (AVParis_70b,20.2) anagninā yadi dahed vidyutā vāpi nirdahet /
GV06avpari_u:7534: (AVParis_70b,20.3) aniśāyāṃ tamāṃsi syur yadi vā pāṃsavo rajaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7535: dhūmāś cānagnijā yatra tatra vidyān mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7536: (AVParis_70b,20.4) rātrau divā cānabhre vā yadi jvālā pradṛśyate /
GV06avpari_u:7537: garhitaṃ jyotiṣāṃ caiva darśanaṃ vā bhaven niśi //
GV06avpari_u:7538: (AVParis_70b,20.5) purāṇāṃ caiva patanaṃ jvalatāṃ ca muhurmuhur /
GV06avpari_u:7539: dṛśyate 'nyac ca sahasā tatrāpy agnibhayaṃ vadet //
GV06avpari_u:7542: (AVParis_70b,21.2) jvalanti yadi śastrāṇi vinamanty unnamanti vā /
GV06avpari_u:7543: kośebhyo vāpi niryānti saṃgrāmas tumulo bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7545: vṛkṣā vā parvatā vāpi tatra vidyān mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7549: dhanunā saha vā bāṇāḥ saṃgrāmas tumulo bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7550: (AVParis_70b,22.1) samidbhiḥ kṣīraṛkṣāṇāṃ sarṣapais tu ghṛtena ca /
