GV06avpari_u:7552: (AVParis_70b,22.2) pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ dvijātīn bhojayet tataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7553: tebhya eva yathāśaktyā dakṣiṇāṃ dāpayen nṛpaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7554: (AVParis_70b,22.3) agnir bhūmyām iti tribhir āgneyaṃ tatra kārayet /
GV06avpari_u:7555: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadyān niṣkam aśvaṃ ca sundaram //
GV06avpari_u:7558: (AVParis_70b,23.2) devatā bhramate yatra mṛtyus tatra vinirdiśet /

GV06avpari_u:7560: (AVParis_70b,23.3) pratisrotavahā nadyo bhavanti ca kathaṃ cana /

GV06avpari_u:7577: sa deśo mānuṣair mukto mṛgāṇāṃ gocaro bhavet //

GV06avpari_u:7584: (AVParis_70b,23.14) tat pātaparityakta kadā cid api budhasyādayaṃ bhavati /
GV06avpari_u:7588: (AVParis_70c,22.1) om āsīnaṃ tu himavati bṛhaspatiṃ sukhāvaham /
GV06avpari_u:7597: (AVParis_70c,23.3) svastikā vardhamānā ca śrīvatsā ca pradakṣiṇā /

GV06avpari_u:7599: (AVParis_70c,23.4) yadā hotra prasannena hūyamāno yathā śikhī /
GV06avpari_u:7600: ghoṣam utpādayan snigdhaṃ kalyāṇaṃ tad vinirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7601: (AVParis_70c,23.5) dīptaś ca ratnasaṃkāśaḥ kṣemo dundubhivad ghanaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7605: (AVParis_70c,24.2) yadā tv agniḥ sarvadikthā jvālāgraiḥ spṛśate haviḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7606: tadāsya nṛpatiḥ śīghraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca mardati //
GV06avpari_u:7607: (AVParis_70c,24.3) tiṣṭhantaṃ sthāvaraṃ snigdhaṃ śrūyate yatra gītakam /

GV06avpari_u:7611: (AVParis_70c,24.5) śatapattrā rudantī ca cāṣasya nandanaṃ tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7614: gāvaḥ savarṇavatsā ca dṛṣṭā home praśasyate //
GV06avpari_u:7617: (AVParis_70c,25.3) gambhīraṃ nardate yatra tad agryaṃ siddhilakṣaṇam /
GV06avpari_u:7619: (AVParis_70c,25.4) dṛṣṭvā vā yadi vā śrutvā karmasiddhiṃ samādiśet /

GV06avpari_u:7627: śiromālā ca dṛśyeta tad vai vijayalakṣaṇam //

GV06avpari_u:7632: (AVParis_70c,26.5) divā rātricarā vāpi rātrau vāpi divācarāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7633: divā vā puramadhyasthā ghoraṃ vāśyanti nirbhayāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7634: (AVParis_70c,27.1) rājadvāre puradvāre śivā vāpy aśubhaṃ vadet /
GV06avpari_u:7636: (AVParis_70c,27.2) āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe vāpi śūnyaṃ bhavati tatpuram /
GV06avpari_u:7638: (AVParis_70c,27.3) dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭān nagare śūnyaṃ bhavati tatpuram] /

GV06avpari_u:7641: vāśante bhairavaṃ yatra tad apy āśu vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7642: (AVParis_70c,27.5) niśāyāṃ bahavaḥ śvāno roruvanti yadā tu te /
GV06avpari_u:7643: hanyamānā na gacchanti tatra vāso na rocate //
GV06avpari_u:7648: (AVParis_70c,27.8) grāmadvāre ca vāśyeta vanād āgatya jambukaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7649: tīkṣṇasvareṇa mahatā diṣṭo grāmavadho hi saḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7650: (AVParis_70c,27.9) yad yāti veśma kapotaḥ praviśeta viśeṣataḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7651: rājaveśmany ulūko vā tat tyājyam acirād gṛham //
GV06avpari_u:7653: patanti bahavo gṛdhrāḥ kākolūkā bakaiḥ saha //
GV06avpari_u:7654: (AVParis_70c,28.1) athāpy eteṣu sthāneṣu madhu saṃjāyate yadā /
GV06avpari_u:7655: nalinī caiva valmīkaḥ ṣaṇmāsair mriyate nṛpaḥ //

GV06avpari_u:7657: yadi cotthāya śṛṇute sa manuṣyo vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7659: atīva bahuśo dṛṣṭvā durbhikṣeṇa kṣayaṃ vadet //
GV06avpari_u:7662: (AVParis_70c,28.5) kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vā śṛṅgaṃ gṛhītvā śunakaḥ svayam /
GV06avpari_u:7663: grāmamadhyena dhāvan syāt tathaivāhur mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7664: (AVParis_70c,29.1) purohitas tu kurvīta kāpotīṃ śāntim uttamām /
GV06avpari_u:7665: devāḥ kapota iti ca sūktaṃ tatra samādiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7666: (AVParis_70c,29.2) āvāpe vyatiṣaṅge ca upariṣṭāc ca hūyate /
GV06avpari_u:7667: kāmikāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād gurur vā yena tuṣyati //
GV06avpari_u:7669: udvijanti rudante vā prasvidyante hasanti vā //
GV06avpari_u:7672: (AVParis_70c,29.5) avāṅmukhā vadante vā sthānāt sthānaṃ vrajanti vā /
GV06avpari_u:7673: vapante vāgnim udakaṃ snehaṃ raktaṃ payo vasām //
GV06avpari_u:7674: (AVParis_70c,30.1) jalpanti vā niśvasanti viceṣṭante rudanti vā /
GV06avpari_u:7675: citraṃ saṃvīkṣyate yatra gātrair vāpi viceṣṭitaiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7678: (AVParis_70c,30.3) rājño vā vyasanaṃ tatra sa vā deṣaḥ pralīyate /
GV06avpari_u:7681: japahomaś ca kalpantā sīdatāṃ ca same pathi //
GV06avpari_u:7682: (AVParis_70c,30.5) same pātam akasmāc ca udāsīnāṃ tathaiva ca /

GV06avpari_u:7685: tatra śāmyanti ghorāṇi japahomaś ca kalpate //
GV06avpari_u:7686: (AVParis_70c,31.2) prasādaḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ vā viśīryeta pateta vā /
GV06avpari_u:7688: (AVParis_70c,31.3) pitāmahasya dharmeṣu yan nimittaṃ dvijeṣu tat /
GV06avpari_u:7691: jñeyaṃ māṇḍalikānāṃ ca yat tat skandaviśākhayoḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7692: (AVParis_70c,31.5) laukikaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jñeyaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca sarvadā /
GV06avpari_u:7698: (AVParis_70c,32.1) athātaḥ sarvasarvasamucchayaḥ ekam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo yathovāca bhagavān bṛhaspatiḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7700: tat samāsena bhūyo 'pi śṛṇu paryāyam āgatam //
GV06avpari_u:7701: (AVParis_70c,32.3) parājito rāhunipīḍitamaṇḍalo vivarṇaḥ saṃdhyāvikṛto niḥprabho yadā /
GV06avpari_u:7702: astamanaṃ yāti divākaraḥ tadāśu vidyāt subrahmajanakṣayam //
GV06avpari_u:7704: tadā dharmaphalaṃ kṣīṇaṃ kalim āviśate prajā //
GV06avpari_u:7705: (AVParis_70c,32.5) amukto rāhuṇā sārdham uttiṣṭhati yadā śaśī /
GV06avpari_u:7706: tadā dharmaphalaṃ kṣīṇaṃ kalim āviśate prajā //
GV06avpari_u:7707: (AVParis_70c,32.6) amukto rāhuṇā sārdham astaṃ gacchati candramāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7708: tadā tato bhayaṃ vidyān mṛtyum āviśate prajā //
GV06avpari_u:7711: (AVParis_70c,32.8) vātaprakopo rajasānuviddhā diśaś ca saṃdhyā ca ghanānuyātā /
GV06avpari_u:7712: drakṣanti saṃdhyā yadi pañcavarṇā bhayāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti //
GV06avpari_u:7714: kṣipraṃ vidravate rāṣṭraṃ daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca //
GV06avpari_u:7717: (AVParis_70c,32.11) yady ahni vāteṣu mahendrarekhā mahendracāpaḥ samudeti rātrau /
GV06avpari_u:7718: tadā bhayaṃ pārthivamaṇḍalānāṃ vadanti śāstrārthavido dvijendrāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7719: (AVParis_70c,32.12) nikalkayukto niśi sendracāpo vivardhamānaḥ samudeti rātrau /
GV06avpari_u:7720: viśīryamāṇā patate tatholkā tadā bhayaṃ pārthivamaṇḍalānām //
GV06avpari_u:7721: (AVParis_70c,32.13) muñcanti nāgā rudhiraṃ karaiś ca lomāni dīpyanti turaṃgamāṇām /
GV06avpari_u:7722: dīpyanti khaḍgāni ca khecarāṇi cihnāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti //
GV06avpari_u:7723: (AVParis_70c,32.14) girivarapatanaṃ svabhūmicālaḥ pratibhayatā ca tathaiva mānuṣāṇām /
GV06avpari_u:7724: vikṛtajananam uktim ugravācā mahati bhaye mṛgapakṣiṇo vadanti //
GV06avpari_u:7725: (AVParis_70c,32.15) chattre gṛhe vāsarathe dhvaje ca dhūmaḥ samuttiṣṭhati yasya cāgniḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7726: sa pārthivaḥ kṣīnamanuṣyakośaḥ prāpnoti nāśaṃ ca janakṣayaṃ ca //
GV06avpari_u:7727: (AVParis_70c,32.16) mahormibhiḥ svair vitatair jaloghair nadyaḥ svakūlāc ca haranti vṛkṣān /
GV06avpari_u:7728: yadi pratisrotavahās tadā syur vināśanā deśaparā nṛpasya //
GV06avpari_u:7729: (AVParis_70c,32.17) yadā tu ghāte ca divākaraprabhāḥ svareṇubhir vāpi vidhūmasaṃbhramāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7730: na tasya vāsaṃ viṣaye vadanti āhur gaṇānāṃ ca vivṛddhināśaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7731: (AVParis_70c,32.18) hutāśanasy jvalanaṃ niredhaṃ tathā na caiva jvalate ca sedhmā /
GV06avpari_u:7733: (AVParis_70c,32.19) śiloccayānāṃ ca śilānipātaḥ puradrumāṇāṃ ca viṣāṇapātaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7734: caityadrumāṇāṃ ca tathaiva pāto bhayāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti //
GV06avpari_u:7736: mṛṇālabāddhāś ca gajā bhavanti bhayāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti //
GV06avpari_u:7737: (AVParis_70c,32.21) prāsādagopuramukhāś ca patanti yatra indradhvajotthitavanaspativājināṃ ca /
GV06avpari_u:7738: teṣāṃ vadanti pacanāni sukhāvahāni saumyādi saṃprabhayatā ca tathādiśanti //
GV06avpari_u:7739: (AVParis_70c,32.22) ūrdhvaṃ vilokya nagaraṃ pratisaṃniviṣṭāḥ sūryodaye khalu rudanti śivātiraudram /
GV06avpari_u:7740: gṛdhrāś ca maṇḍalasamutpatitā bhramanti prāptaṃ bhayaṃ janapadasya samādiśanti //
GV06avpari_u:7741: (AVParis_70c,32.23) daṇḍāśaniḥ patati yatra savisphuliṅgā bhūḥ kampate dinakarasya bhavet praśāntiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7742: candhre ca yatra vikṛtaṃ ca bhaved aśāntaṃ māsāt samudbhavati tatra bhayo 'tighoraḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7744: saṃdhyāsu rakṣo 'dhipater janānāṃ prabhūti rājño 'tibhaye bhavanti //
GV06avpari_u:7745: (AVParis_70c,32.25) vṛṣṭir yadā varṣati reṇuvarṣais tatopariṣṭād dharitālavarṣam /
GV06avpari_u:7746: tataḥ paraṃ varṣati śailavarṣaṃ tadā balaṃ naśyati pārthivasya //
GV06avpari_u:7747: (AVParis_70c,32.26) āraṇyo grāmavāsī mṛgaśakunigaṇo grāmavāsī vanānte gṛdhrāṇāṃ saṃnipāto narapatibhavane gopure vā pure vā /
GV06avpari_u:7748: yatra syān mānuṣīṇāṃ kharakarabhamukhānekarūpā prasūtis tatsthāne jīvitārthī sthitim ati kurute naiva pātaiḥ praduṣṭe //
GV06avpari_u:7749: (AVParis_70c,32.27) prayānti devāḥ sahasāyatasthā vanāni vā yatra patanti bhūmau /
GV06avpari_u:7750: sthānāni mucyanti nadanti ke cit tathā paraṃ śoṇitajagdhagātrāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7753: (AVParis_70c,32.29) agnīnāṃ saṃpradoṣāḥ pratibhayajananā dīpyamānā diśaś ca madhyāhne cāntarikṣe grahagaṇakhacitā gṛdhrasaṃghaiḥ prakīrṇāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7754: nirghātaiḥ pāṃsuvarṣaiḥ satatamalinatā bhūpracālaś ca ghoro devānāṃ cāśrupāto nṛpatibhayakarā rāṣṭranāśāya caite //
GV06avpari_u:7755: (AVParis_70c,32.30) śivādaye yatra divākarasya jvālāvimucy ūrdhvamukhī praroditi /
GV06avpari_u:7756: samāvṛtā vāyasagṛdhrasaṃghais tadā bhayaṃ vedavido vadanti //
GV06avpari_u:7757: (AVParis_70c,32.31) rudanti nāgās tu vimuktahastā vimuktadantās turagā rudanti /
GV06avpari_u:7758: rudanti nāryaś ca samāgame ca tadā bhayaṃ syāc chrutiliṅgamūlam //
GV06avpari_u:7759: (AVParis_70c,32.32) yadā tu vastrāṇi varadrumāṇāṃ prakāśavṛṣṭyā nipatanti mūrdhni /
GV06avpari_u:7760: samīkṣya pātaṃ ca yathārthadṛṣṭaṃ bhayāya rāṣṭrasya nṛpasya vidyāt //
GV06avpari_u:7764: na tasyātikramaḥ kaś cid akṛte śāntikarmaṇi //
GV06avpari_u:7766: japaṃ homaṃ ca śāntiṃ ca utpāteṣu prayojayet //
GV06avpari_u:7768: homaṃ lakṣamitaṃ kuryāj japed vā vedasaṃhitām /
GV06avpari_u:7772: divyāṃś caivāntarikṣāṃś ca utpātān pārthivāṃs tathā //
GV06avpari_u:7782: puṣpe phale ca vṛkṣāṇām akāle ca virohaṇe //
GV06avpari_u:7785: (AVParis_71,2.3) ye cānye ke cid utpātā jāyante vikṛtātmakāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7786: teṣāṃ phalaṃ ca kālaṃ ca tattvenācakṣva bhārgava //
GV06avpari_u:7787: (AVParis_71,2.4) sa tasmai pṛcchate samyaṅ nāradāyāśanāḥ kaviḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7789: (AVParis_71,2.5) yadā śīte bhavaty uṣṇam uṣṇe śītam atīva ca /
GV06avpari_u:7790: navamāsāt paraṃ vidyāt teṣu deśeṣu vai bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7792: tasmin deśe pradhānasya puruṣasya vadho bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7793: (AVParis_71,3.2) kokilāś ca mayūrāś ca akāle madabhāginaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7794: saṃsargaṃ vāpi gaccheyur vidyāj jānapadaṃ bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7795: (AVParis_71,3.3) ruravaś caiva raudrāś ca pṛṣatā hariṇās tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7796: yeṣu deśeṣu dṛśyante tān araṇyāya nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7797: (AVParis_71,3.4) pradhānāś caiva vadhyante pakṣe saptadaśe tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7798: tasmiñ janapade caiva mahad utpadyate bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7800: nakulāḥ pakṣiṇo vyālāḥ sūkarā mahiṣā mṛgāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7801: (AVParis_71,4.1) sattvāny etāni jalpanti yeṣu deśeṣu mānuṣam /
GV06avpari_u:7802: teṣu deśeṣu rājā tu ṣaṣṭhe māsi vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7803: (AVParis_71,4.2) utpātā vikṛtātmāno dṛśyante yatra tatra vai /
GV06avpari_u:7804: deśe bhavati śīghraṃ hi ṣaṇmāsād bhayam uttamam //
GV06avpari_u:7805: (AVParis_71,4.3) āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ yadā yatra prasarpati /
GV06avpari_u:7806: vipakṣāt tatra tatsvāmī bhayaṃ prāpnoti dāruṇam //
GV06avpari_u:7808: etāni yatra sarpanti vikṛtāni vadanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:7809: (AVParis_71,4.5) bahu vā jāyate tīvraṃ tasmin deśe bhayaṃ mahat /
GV06avpari_u:7810: trīn māsān parakāle tu śeṣe saumyātikaṃ phalam //
GV06avpari_u:7811: (AVParis_71,5.1) deśe vā yadi vā grāme yonivyatikaro bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:7812: tatra saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ mahad utpadyate bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7813: (AVParis_71,5.2) gaur aśvaṃ vaḍavā vāpi yasmin deśe prasūyate /
GV06avpari_u:7815: (AVParis_71,5.3) mānuṣī janayed yatra tṛṇādān vividhān paśūn /
GV06avpari_u:7816: ṣaṇmāsotthaṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ tatra tūtpadyate mahat //
GV06avpari_u:7819: (AVParis_71,5.5) sarpaṃ vā pakṣiṇaṃ vāpi janayed yatra mānuṣī /
GV06avpari_u:7820: pracalas tasya deśasya ṣaṇmāsāt tu paraṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7821: (AVParis_71,6.1) uṣṭraṃ vā yā prasūyeta vānaraṃ vāpi mānuṣī /
GV06avpari_u:7822: anyad vā jaṅgamaṃ kiṃ cit sthāvaraṃ vāpi kiṃ cana //
GV06avpari_u:7824: sa deśo vyathate śīghraṃ rājā tatra vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7825: (AVParis_71,6.3) amānuṣī mānuṣaṃ vā mānuṣī vāpy amānuṣam /
GV06avpari_u:7827: (AVParis_71,6.4) caturakṣaṃ dviśīrṣaṃ vā gātrair nyūnādhikais tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7830: uṣṭro vṛṣo vāpy aśvo vā gajo vā yatra jāyate //
GV06avpari_u:7831: (AVParis_71,6.6) pakṣān māsāc ca bhavati rājñas tatra bhayaṃ mahat /
GV06avpari_u:7832: paracakrasamutthaṃ vā sa deśo bhayam ṛcchati //
GV06avpari_u:7834: gaur vā sūyet tathānyāni tatra rājyaṃ vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7835: (AVParis_71,7.2) vasanti yeṣu deśeṣu teṣu vidyān mahad bhayam /
GV06avpari_u:7836: tasmād etāni sattvāni rājā kṣipraṃ pravāsayet //
GV06avpari_u:7837: (AVParis_71,7.3) aśvā kiśoraṃ janayec chṛṅgiṇaṃ yatra tatra tu /
GV06avpari_u:7838: ādiśen maraṇaṃ rājño varṣābhyantara eva hi //
GV06avpari_u:7839: (AVParis_71,7.4) māghe budhe ca mahiṣī śrāvaṇe vaḍavā divā /
GV06avpari_u:7843: rākṣasān vā piśācān vā yadāpy evaṃ prasūyate //
GV06avpari_u:7844: (AVParis_71,7.6) vyāpadyante 'tra dhānyāni sasyāni ca dhanāni ca /
GV06avpari_u:7845: caturvidhaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ kṣipraṃ tatra pravartate //
GV06avpari_u:7846: (AVParis_71,8.1) vadhyante hi pradhānās tu sārdhamāsāṣṭame tathā /
GV06avpari_u:7847: vyādhīṃś ca teṣu deśeṣu trīṇi varṣāṇi nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7848: (AVParis_71,8.2) anagnir jvalate yatra deśe tūrṇam anindhanaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7849: yo rājā tasya deśasya sadeśaḥ sa vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7851: asthīni rudhiraṃ majjāṃ vasāṃ caiteṣu vai dhruvam //
GV06avpari_u:7852: (AVParis_71,8.4) paracakrāgamaḥ śīghraṃ vijñeyas tu mahad bhayam /
GV06avpari_u:7855: kṣipraṃ tatra bhayaṃ ghoraṃ pravarteta caturvidham //
GV06avpari_u:7856: (AVParis_71,9.1) sarpān matsyān pakṣiṇo vā yatra devaḥ pravarṣati /
GV06avpari_u:7858: (AVParis_71,9.2) surāsavaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ sarpis tailaṃ payo dadhi /
GV06avpari_u:7859: yatra varṣati parjanyaḥ kṣudrogas tatra jāyate //
GV06avpari_u:7860: (AVParis_71,9.3) ulkātārāś ca dhiṣṇyeṣu yadāṅgārāṃś ca varṣati /
GV06avpari_u:7861: tadā vyādhibhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7862: (AVParis_71,9.4) pumān aśvo gajo vāpi yadā yatra pradīpyate /
GV06avpari_u:7864: (AVParis_71,9.5) nārācāḥ śaktayaḥ khaḍgāḥ pradīpyante yadā muhuḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7865: tadā śastrabhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7867: prahasanti prasarpanti gāyanti ca rudanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:7869: sacakrā vāpi naśyanti pradhānaś cātra vadhyate //
GV06avpari_u:7870: (AVParis_71,10.3) yatra sravec caityavṛkṣaḥ sahasā vividhān rasān /
GV06avpari_u:7871: pṛthakpṛthak samastān vā tat pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam //
GV06avpari_u:7872: (AVParis_71,10.4) ghṛte madhuni dugdhe ca ghṛte dugdhe tathāmbhasi /
GV06avpari_u:7873: kṣaudre madhuni taile vā vyādhayaḥ syuḥ sudāruṇāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7875: taile pradhānā vadhyante bhakṣe kṣudbhayam ādiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7876: (AVParis_71,11.1) anṛtau cet phalaṃ yatra puṣpaṃ vā sūyate drumaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7877: vidyād dvādaśame māsi rājñas tatra viparyayam //
GV06avpari_u:7878: (AVParis_71,11.2) puṣpe puṣpaṃ bhaved yatra phale vā syāt tathā phalam /
GV06avpari_u:7879: parṇe parṇaṃ vijānīyāt tatra jānapadaṃ bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7881: brāhmaṇānāṃ bhayaṃ ghoram āśu tīvraṃ vinirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7884: (AVParis_71,11.5) nīlaiḥ sasyopaghātaḥ syāc citrais tu mṛgapakṣiṇām /
GV06avpari_u:7885: vivarṇair vyādhayas tīvrāḥ paraṃ syur daśamāsataḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7886: (AVParis_71,12.1) daivatāni prasarpanti yatra rāṣṭre hasanti vā /
GV06avpari_u:7887: udīkṣante 'tha rodhāṃsi tatra vidyān mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7890: (AVParis_71,12.3) yatra citram udīkṣeta gāyate ceṣṭate muhuḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7891: eteṣv aṣṭasu māseṣu rājño maraṇam ādiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7893: vikāraṃ kuryur atyarthaṃ tatra vidyān mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7894: (AVParis_71,12.5) udapānaṃ taḍāgaṃ vā saraḥ parvata eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:7896: (AVParis_71,13.1) [prahaseyuḥ staneyur vā] śvā vā mārjāravad vadet /
GV06avpari_u:7897: tasya deśasya rājā tu pīḍām āpnoti dāruṇām //
GV06avpari_u:7899: deśe yatra bhṛśaṃ tatra rājadaṇḍo nipātyate //
GV06avpari_u:7900: (AVParis_71,13.3) yasya rājño janapade nityodvignāḥ prajāḥ kṣayam /
GV06avpari_u:7901: gacchanti na citrāt tatra vināśam api nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7902: (AVParis_71,13.4) yasya rājño janapade nityam eva gavāṃ kṣayaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7904: (AVParis_71,13.5) yasya rājño janapade nadī vahati kardamam /
GV06avpari_u:7905: kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ copalaṃ vā mṛtamatsyān grahāṃs tathā //
GV06avpari_u:7906: (AVParis_71,14.1) madyaṃ kṣaudraṃ ca māṃsaṃ ca sarpis tailaṃ payo dadhi /
GV06avpari_u:7908: (AVParis_71,14.2) yasya rājño janapade pratisroto nadī vahet /
GV06avpari_u:7910: (AVParis_71,14.3) kūpo vā garjate yatra yadā vāpy avadīryate /
GV06avpari_u:7911: lohitaṃ vātha pūyaṃ vā bhayaṃ tatra vinirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7913: tūṇīrāt sahasā bāṇā udgiranti nadanti ca //
GV06avpari_u:7914: (AVParis_71,14.5) svabhāvataś ca pūryante dhanūmṣi prajvalanti ca /
GV06avpari_u:7915: saṃgrāmo dāruṇas tatra deśe bhavati biścitaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7916: (AVParis_71,15.1) akāle puṣpavantaś ca phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7917: dṛśyante yasya rāṣṭreṣu tasya nāśo vibhāvyate //
GV06avpari_u:7918: (AVParis_71,15.2) vṛkṣā vallyaś ca taruṇā yatra syuḥ phalapuṣpadāḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7919: akāle cāpi dṛśyeyus tatra vidyān mahad bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7920: (AVParis_71,15.3) prāsādāni vimānāni prajvalanti tu yatra vai /
GV06avpari_u:7921: dṛḍhāni ca viśīryante yasya sa mriyate 'cirāt //
GV06avpari_u:7922: (AVParis_71,15.4) vadanty araṇye tūryāṇi śrūyante vyomni nityaśaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7923: nivaseta tadā rājā samāgamya diśo daśa //
GV06avpari_u:7925: akasmān mriyate samyag dhanaṃ cāsya vilupyate //
GV06avpari_u:7928: (AVParis_71,15.7) saṃbhṛtyaiva tato bhāram anyaṃ janapadaṃ vrajet /
GV06avpari_u:7929: mṛgavāṃs tu sa deśo hi vāyuś cātropajāyate //
GV06avpari_u:7931: chidrāṇi ca gṛhe yasya sa śīghraṃ bhayam ṛcchati //
GV06avpari_u:7932: (AVParis_71,15.9) devarājadhvajānāṃ ca patanaṃ bhaṅga eva vā /
GV06avpari_u:7933: kravyādānāṃ praveśaṃ ca rājñaḥ pīḍākaraṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7936: (AVParis_71,16.1) aśvatthe puṣpite kṣatraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpy udumbare /
GV06avpari_u:7937: plakṣe vaiśyāś tu pīḍyante nyagrodhe dasyavas tathā //
GV06avpari_u:7942: (AVParis_71,16.4) indrayaṣṭir bhajyate vā viśasto vā paśur vrajet /
GV06avpari_u:7943: yadā tadā vijānīyād rājñaḥ pīḍām upasthitām //
GV06avpari_u:7946: (AVParis_71,17.1) bṛhaspatau vā śukre vā pāvake pākaśāsane /
GV06avpari_u:7947: yāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante vidyāt tāni purohite //
GV06avpari_u:7951: (AVParis_71,17.3) devānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca ratho yatra nimajjati /
GV06avpari_u:7953: (AVParis_71,17.4) some ca vāsudeve ca varuṇe pākaśāsane /
GV06avpari_u:7954: yad bhayaṃ dṛśyate tadd hi jñeyaṃ bhāṇḍādhike kane //
GV06avpari_u:7955: (AVParis_71,17.5) vāte prājāpatau caiva viśvakarmaṇi caiva hi /
GV06avpari_u:7956: pravartate yan nimittaṃ taj jānapadikaṃ bhavet //
GV06avpari_u:7958: tathā preṣyeṣu sarveṣu kalpayec chāstrataḥ phalam //
GV06avpari_u:7960: vīramātā ca yad brūyus tad rājamahiṣībhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7961: (AVParis_71,17.8) ekaivāsāṃ tathā cānyā yāś cānyā devatāḥ striyaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7962: kuryur nimittaṃ tat strīṇāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7963: (AVParis_71,17.9) gandharveṣu nimittaṃ yat tad anyeṣu pradṛśyate /
GV06avpari_u:7968: sarveṣv aṅgeṣu nārīṇāṃ tulyaṃ syād ubhayor bhayam //
GV06avpari_u:7974: te ca deśā vinaśyanti rājā vātha vinaśyati //
GV06avpari_u:7975: (AVParis_71,18.5) brāhmaṇā yatra vadhyante grāme rāṣṭre 'tha vā pure /
GV06avpari_u:7976: rājadhānīṣu vā yatra tad abhāvasya lakṣaṇam //
GV06avpari_u:7978: tatra daivakṛto daṇḍo nipataty āśu rājani //
GV06avpari_u:7983: (AVParis_71,19.4) senā caiva na dṛśyeta hastyaśvaiś ca padātibhiḥ /
GV06avpari_u:7984: hīnāṅgā vikṛtāṅgā vā pralayaṃ tatra nirdiśet //
GV06avpari_u:7985: (AVParis_71,19.5) stambhavṛkṣā dhvajā yatra sraveyū rudhirāmbu ca /
GV06avpari_u:7986: dhūmayeyur jvaleyur vā mantriṇāṃ tatra vai vadhaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:7987: (AVParis_71,19.6) jagatsvāmini jānīyād yadi ced divi jāyate /
GV06avpari_u:7988: āntarikṣaṃ tu deśe syād bhaumaṃ sasyopatiṣṭhati //
GV06avpari_u:7989: (AVParis_71,19.7) bhāryāyāṃ vāhane putre kośe senāpatau pure /
GV06avpari_u:7990: purohite narendre vā patate daivam aṣṭadhā //
GV06avpari_u:7991: (AVParis_71,19.8) māhendrīm amṛtāṃ raudrīṃ vaiśvadevīm athāpi vā /
GV06avpari_u:7993: (AVParis_71,19.9) śāmyanti yena ghorāṇi yogakṣemaṃ ca jāyate /
GV06avpari_u:7997: (AVParis_72,1.2) kṣipravipākīny amoghāni ghorāṇi grahopahatam ulkābhihataṃ grastaṃ nirastam upadhūpitaṃ vā yadā syāj janmanakṣatraṃ karmanakṣatram abhiṣecanīyajanapadanakṣatram
GV06avpari_u:7998: (AVParis_72,1.3) eteṣu kṣipram eva mahāśāntim amṛtāṃ kārayed rājāṣṭame ca candramasaḥ sthāne <
GV06avpari_u:8001: (AVParis_72,1.4) atha vā nānāvarṇe bahurūpe śṛṅgiṇi cāditye kīlavati c[ādbhutāny] ulkābhihate
GV06avpari_u:8003: (AVParis_72,1.6) hāse bhāse nāde śabde vāsane ca vaiśvānare 'prajvalite 'ntarikṣe bhasmāsthyaśmāṅgārā vīthī cendradhanuṣi rātrau vīdhra eva tu //
GV06avpari_u:8004: (AVParis_72,2.1) candrārkau yasya rāṣṭre pariviṣyetātāṃ tān vipakṣān parolakasaṃsthāñ janapadāṃs
GV06avpari_u:8005: (AVParis_72,2.2) tathaiva kākakapotakaṅkagṛdhrayakṣarākṣasapiśācaśvāpadeṣu naktaṃ vadatsv abhivadatsu gāyatsu rāyatsu vā cakradhvajaveśmāvasathaprāsādāgre
GV06avpari_u:8006: (AVParis_72,2.3) vāpīkūpa udapāne codgirati nadati vidyotati vā
GV06avpari_u:8009: (AVParis_72,2.6) kālolūkakṛkalāsaśyenanipatite rājachattre bhagne dhvaje cakrasya rājño daṇḍe rājñaś ca dante
GV06avpari_u:8010: (AVParis_72,2.7) hastinyāṃ ca mattāyāṃ grāme ca prasūtāyām
GV06avpari_u:8011: (AVParis_72,2.8) rājarathaś ca rājādhirūḍho bhagnākṣaḥ saptarātrād rājño hanti purohitam amātyaṃ senāpatiṃ jāyāṃ hastinaṃ mahiṣīṃ kumāraṃ rājānam eva vā ṛdhnuyād ya evaṃ veda
GV06avpari_u:8012: (AVParis_72,2.9) dvādaśaṃ śataṃ gavāṃ dhenūnāṃ kaṃsavasanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ niṣko 'śva etāś ca dakṣiṇāḥ //
GV06avpari_u:8015: tasmāt sthānaṃ samuddiśya kārayec chāntim ātmanaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:8020: (AVParis_72,3.5) hīnagabhastī dve mārge vīthyau vittakṣaye somasya kṣaye 'pūrṇapūraṇe kṣayasyāvabhāsāḥ sadyo 'pararātrād digdāhopadhūpanam
GV06avpari_u:8021: (AVParis_72,3.6) grahavaiṣamyam ārohaṇam ākramaṇaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ mārutaprakopas tithikaraṇamuhūrtanakṣatragrahādīnāṃ somaviyogaḥ
GV06avpari_u:8022: (AVParis_72,3.7) pratisrotogāminyo nadyaḥ prāsādatoraṇadhvajeṣu vāyasasamavāyā vṛkaśakaṭārohaṇaṃ vṛṣadaṃśātimārjanam ulūkapratigarjanaṃ śyenagṛdhrādīnāṃ dhvajābhilapanam
GV06avpari_u:8023: (AVParis_72,3.8) vikṛtāś ca mānuṣāmānuṣaprabhavāḥ strībālavṛddhapralāpāḥ pradīptendrayaṣṭipādabhagne 'dravyeṣv ekavṛkṣe dvichāye pratichāye parivṛktam
GV06avpari_u:8024: (AVParis_72,3.9) ata ūrdhvam [chāyo] 'kasmāc caityavṛkṣastambhapatane virohatsv aviroheṣv achinnaparṇaprapātāc chuṣkaśākhino drumā dhūmarajodakaprādurbhāvagamaneṣu vanaspatiṣu
GV06avpari_u:8025: (AVParis_72,3.10) bahuśastrabhaṅga indrakīlagopurāṭṭālakadhvajādīnāṃ bhaṅga ucitānāṃ vyucchedane 'nucitānāṃ pravardhane dṛḍhabhaṅgesu
GV06avpari_u:8026: (AVParis_72,3.11) śuṣkavirohe gṛhe valmīke śayanadeśe darhastambotpattau mitravirodhe 'mitraprītau ca devatārcayo tathachedane
GV06avpari_u:8027: (AVParis_72,3.12) yatra rājāprasādamukhaḥ paureṣu ca bhṛtyādiṣu bhavati bhavanti cātra ślokāḥ
GV06avpari_u:8028: (AVParis_72,3.13) yadā tu pratipat somo vikṛtyā vikṛto bhavet /
GV06avpari_u:8029: anudbhinno vilūno vā rājño maraṇam ādiśet //
GV06avpari_u:8032: (AVParis_72,3.15) yadā candrārkayor madhye kṛṣṇaṃ bhavati maṇḍalam /
GV06avpari_u:8033: sa śaṅkur iti vijñeyo grahaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ //
GV06avpari_u:8035: tatra kuryān mahāśāntim amṛtāṃ viśvabheṣajīm iti //
GV06avpari_u:8036: (AVParis_72,4.1) atha yasminn eva janapade gobrāhmaṇasūtasāṃvatsaravaidyānāṃ parivrājakacāraṇavānaprasthabrahmacāriṇāṃ vāpi saṃkaraḥ pravartate tad adbhutaṃ vidyāt
GV06avpari_u:8037: (AVParis_72,4.2) karmasaṃkaraṃ yajñasaṃkaraṃ vyavahārasaṃkaraṃ ca yatra ca dharmo 'dharmeṣa pīḍyate tad adbhutaṃ vidyāt
GV06avpari_u:8038: (AVParis_72,4.3) teṣām ajñātaprāyaścittaṃ yad ajñātam anāmnātam iti madhye juhuyāt puruṣasūktaṃ ca teṣv akṛtaprāyaścitteṣu mahādbhutāni prādurbhavanti //
GV06avpari_u:8039_0: (AVParis_72,4.4) divyānīty ācakṣate devagṛheṣv atha hasanti gāyanti rudanti krośanti
GV06avpari_u:8039_1: prasvidyanti pradhūmāyanti prajvalanti prakampanty unmīlayanti nimīlayanti lihitaṃ
GV06avpari_u:8040: (AVParis_72,4.5) teṣām prādurbhāvagamaneṣv anyarājāgamanaṃ vā vidyād udagraṃ vā[ṅgegam] avṛṣṭiśastrabhayaṃ bubhukṣāmāraṃ jānapadam amātyānāṃ rājño vināśam
GV06avpari_u:8041: (AVParis_72,4.6) teṣu sarveṣu bhṛgvaṅgirovidam ity uktaṃ sa catuṣpatha īśānaṃ prapadyeta //
GV06avpari_u:8042: oṃ prapadye bhūḥ prapadye bhuvaḥ prapadye svaḥ prapadye janat prapadya iti prapadyeta
GV06avpari_u:8043_0: (AVParis_72,4.7) kapilānām aṣṭaśatasya kṣīreṇa pāyasaṃ śrapayitvā kapilāsv alabhyamānāsu
GV06avpari_u:8043_1: dogdhrīṇāṃ śatasya kṣīreṇa pāyasaṃ śarapayitvā prāñcam idhmam upasamādhāya paristīrya
GV06avpari_u:8044_0: sarpir juhuyāt pāyasaṃ juhuyāc chuklāḥ sumanasa upahared brāhmaṇān bhaktenopepasanti
GV06avpari_u:8044_1: tā eva gā dadyād rājyaṃ vā parimitakālaṃ tasya parituṣṭaye gosahasraṃ kartre dadyād grāmavaraṃ ca //
GV06avpari_u:8045: (AVParis_72,5.1) atha yatraitac chayane vātha vastre vā jāyate yad dhutāśanaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:8050: (AVParis_72,5.3) sṛjanti devā divyādbhutāni prāg upasargāt pratibodhanārtham /
GV06avpari_u:8051: kāryāṇi vighnāni tathā janānāṃ karmākule varṇasamākule ca //
GV06avpari_u:8052: (AVParis_72,5.4) daivyopasṛṣṭena balena kāryaṃ kārya ca śāntiḥ praṇipatya devān /
GV06avpari_u:8053: tatopasargād vighnāt pramucyate divi ced aniṣṭaṃ na punaḥ sa kuryāt //
GV06avpari_u:8054: (AVParis_72,5.5) pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca divi cāpy upalakṣayet /
GV06avpari_u:8056: (AVParis_72,6.1) grāme kule vā yadi vāpi deśe rājany amātyeṣu tathā dvijeṣu /
GV06avpari_u:8057: bhāvaḥ paśūnāṃ vikṛto virūpas tad adbhutaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāt //
GV06avpari_u:8059: apādahaste mriyate hy amātyo jāte kavandhe nṛpatir vinaśyet //
GV06avpari_u:8060: (AVParis_72,6.3) yadādhikāṅgo yadi vāṅgahīno bhavet paśūnāṃ vikṛto virūpaḥ /
GV06avpari_u:8061: strīṇāṃ tathaiva vikṛto virūpas tad adbhutaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāt //
GV06avpari_u:8062: (AVParis_72,6.4) anāsyaṃ vāpy anoṣṭhaṃ vā jāyate ced vidūlakam /
GV06avpari_u:8063: arūpam asarūpaṃ vā jāyate ced vidūlakam //
GV06avpari_u:8064: (AVParis_72,6.5) adharādīnn acakṣur vā jāyate ced vidūlakam /
GV06avpari_u:8066: (AVParis_72,6.6) tam adbhiḥ snātaṃ surabhiṃ sugandhiṃ gatāsum agnau juhuyād ghṛtāktam /
GV06avpari_u:8067: ganeṇa raudreṇa ghṛtaṃ ca hutvā tathā mahātmā śivam asya kuryāt //
